description: You might have played many police transport games but this new robot transport game comes with a different set of challenges from other US police transport games. Police Robot Car Game ‚Äì Police Plane Transport is a brand new edition to the police robot games from the city of New York with US police transform robot. If you want to be a police airplane transporter and a robot transformation expert all at the same time, then this robot car game is for you. NYPD police and LAPD has collaborated a secret police mission to transform robot car into police robot transforming bots to root out crime from their cities. You will get to drive best police transport truck, car, bike and police aeroplane all-in-one game for NY police. This, combined with the strategy involved in police plane transport games and technique of transforming robot games makes this robot simulator one of the best police games. Transport robot car and bike in police truck to airport and then fly cargo plane as an airplane pilot to the secret island where NYPD police research center is located. The cars & bikes will transform into transforming robots not seen in any other robot police games. Later, transport robot transforming bots in police plane for crime fighting with NYPD. So get into action with fast police car driving of police car games and robot shooting missions of robot action games to enjoy unparalleled entertainment of best robot games in this car transporter game. In this US Police robot transport game, you will transport the robot cars and moto robots in the police truck & cargo plane to NYPD police quarters to transform them into robots. No car transporter games provide gameplay as holistic as this police robot games. Afterwards, the transforming robots will be trained to kill criminals. In case you are fan of police transport games and enjoy robot transform games, you will love this police plane game. Realistic 3D models of robot cars, police airplanes, moto robots and highly detailed environment makes police robot simulator more engaging than other police robot games. Captivating gameplay from best robot games is combined with vehicle controls of best transport games to push this new police game in the category of best police games. Police Robot Car Game ‚Äì Police Plane Transport will take you for a ride in the genre beyond what you have seen yet. It would not be a survival mission as depicted in other US police transport games but a test of nerves to carry out top secret robot transformation mission in police headquarters.If you are ready to become airplane pilot, robot transforming expert & a robot shooting pro all by yourself, we invite you to play robot transport game. Your sergeant will guide you through the police transportation steps, taking US police transport games to an supreme heights and making you a distinguished police officer in a crime city. Add to your portfolio of police robot games and transform robot games with this robot simulator.Features of Police Robot Car Game ‚Äì Police Plane Transport:- Amazing transform robot car, moto robot and plane models- Highly tuned police car, motorcycle & airplane controls- Best police aeroplane games sounds & animations- Detailed NYPD police training centers unseen in best police games- Multi-role game with car transporter role in plane transport games

description: For a whole new slime adventure join us on board and let‚Äôs learn how to make slime together in fun and educational, DIY games!! The game has all the make and play features which not only demonstrates you how to make slime but also teaches you how to make slime fulfilling its purposes to be part of the learning games radar!! There are many ways to make slime and this diy games teaches you all those different methods with fun, engaging and interactive game play features!! The hand indicators will guide you through the game in order to make the most professional slime so that it becomes a great learning and education experience for you!!The game gives you a selection to choose from, which slime you want to make and play with as a first. The first time of slime making includes the slime which only needs glue, water and starch, the second type of slime is added with shaving foam and the third type of slime is made with addition of toothpaste!!Before you officially begin to make slime obviously download and install the game and select your scene which includes the process of making and playing. The first type of slime making includes; glue, starch, water, color and for finishing touch add some fancy glitter. For the second type of slime making the ingredients include; glue, shaving foam, starch, color and water!! Lastly, the third type of slime making includes the following ingredients; glue, shaving foam, tooth paste, color, water and some beads for decoration!!! The official game play with these ingredients include the process of making!! These includes adding all the slime making ingredients together and mixing them all together!! Once the slime making mixture has been make the next is cutting shapes and then the process is followed by placing the slime on the surface!! After it has been placed on the surface to give it different forms and shapes you will use a roller to flat it out and cut it in shapes using a cutter!! The best part is, you can make your own slime shapes as well!!!*** HOW TO PLAY GAME ***Start game Select scene Select slime type Using hand indicators mix all the ingredients; slime is made Cut slime into shapes Roll slime and give it new shapes with stencil Make your own shapePlay with all types *** FEATURES OF GAME ***Fun kids games Hand indicators to help in playing Educational and learning game Different kinds of slime Interactive game play This game can be happily played by people of all ages!!
descriptionHTML:
For a whole new slime adventure join us on board and let’s learn how to make slime together in fun and educational, DIY games!! The game has all the make and play features which not only demonstrates you how to make slime but also teaches you how to make slime fulfilling its purposes to be part of the learning games radar!!

There are many ways to make slime and this diy games teaches you all those different methods with fun, engaging and interactive game play features!! The hand indicators will guide you through the game in order to make the most professional slime so that it becomes a great learning and education experience for you!!

The game gives you a selection to choose from, which slime you want to make and play with as a first. The first time of slime making includes the slime which only needs glue, water and starch, the second type of slime is added with shaving foam and the third type of slime is made with addition of toothpaste!!

Before you officially begin to make slime obviously download and install the game and select your scene which includes the process of making and playing. The first type of slime making includes; glue, starch, water, color and for finishing touch add some fancy glitter.

For the second type of slime making the ingredients include; glue, shaving foam, starch, color and water!! Lastly, the third type of slime making includes the following ingredients; glue, shaving foam, tooth paste, color, water and some beads for decoration!!!

The official game play with these ingredients include the process of making!! These includes adding all the slime making ingredients together and mixing them all together!!
Once the slime making mixture has been make the next is cutting shapes and then the process is followed by placing the slime on the surface!!

After it has been placed on the surface to give it different forms and shapes you will use a roller to flat it out and cut it in shapes using a cutter!! The best part is, you can make your own slime shapes as well!!!

*** HOW TO PLAY GAME ***

Start game
Select scene
Select slime type
Using hand indicators mix all the ingredients; slime is made
Cut slime into shapes
Roll slime and give it new shapes with stencil
Make your own shape
Play with all types

*** FEATURES OF GAME ***

Fun kids games
Hand indicators to help in playing
Educational and learning game
Different kinds of slime
Interactive game play

This game can be happily played by people of all ages!!

comments: This is an all around solid game. It's actually play to win for a change, i haven't had to spend a single cent to advance through the game. Also ads are not all that intrusive, I'll maybe get 1 every 30-45 minutes of game play, which is far better than other games where it's ads every minute The controls are good, especially considering it's on a mobile device. Game play is fun and pretty easy going. And while its engaging, it is not so difficult that it's just frustrating. I would recommend this game to anyone who liked these types of games. And a solid well done to the creators

I know Ads are important for devs for monetary purpose to make more awesome games but too much of it making me full of frustrations.. No doubt, this game is fantastic. Gameplay and Graphics are Awesome.. But please decrease then frequency of ads for the sake of poor people or people who don't wanna invest money on games..

Extremely entertaining. Love the story and gameflow. Parts are challanging enough and rewarding for efforts. Not to pricy for purchaces. The stability of the scope is a little rough even with upgrades and can be a little frustrating at first until you get better weapons. In fact, the scope sway is SO ANNOYING THAT IT RUINS a great game. No sniper scope drifts like that especially with a "bipod" they upgrade you with. Fix it. Overall, a well polished game. Good job team!

One of the best sniper games I've tried, seemingly very realistic with the movement and stability of the scope.  Some sniper games you just point your scope and fire, no challenge, this one has more realistic challenges to shooting.  Now, I've never fired an actual sniper rifle, but it seems much more real-world than just simply pointing and shooting a perfectly still sniper scope.  Also, I love the accents of the voices, makes me laugh.  My only gripe is it doesn't take long at all to finish all the missions, hopefully the developers update the game with more missions soon!

I could've given 5 stars cause the game is good and easy to play with. What I am annoyed is that the life bar is not replenishing.. I mean most games (I think all of it) will still refresh your stamina even of you exit the game, but with this, for me to have my life refilled, I needed to have the game open all of the time. What is the sense of me waiting for 15 minutes at the game that I cant play if my life is not refreshing. Please fix.

The very best. Just one problem. The stamina does not get refilled after closing the application. The notification comes saying the stamina is filled, but once you open it, the stamina is 0% and the countdown starts from 3 minutes. Stamina gets refilled only on the opening of the application. Please fix this bug as soon as possible. Otherwise... Its the best game.

comments: This is an extremely fun game. O have a few suggestions on how to fix things on the game. I noticed three things while playing this game. 1. There is not a continue playing option. This can easily be fixed and with all of the great work from Dvloper I think that this is not too far away. 2. I noticed you can uncrouch in the tunnel in the basement even though you are not all the way through. 3. Everything is in a certain place. If one object is in a certain place then if you are familiar with the game enough you will know where the other objects are. To be honest this is not a minor concern but still could be fixed. Other than that I can't stop playing! Thank you so much!!

It's really really really fun game.  But I think if you guys do some more improvements so it will be much fun.  Here's what I think:  1. I think you should make the house much bigger.  2. You should add more enemies for example:  child o' slenderina,  slenderman and the spiders.  3. You should add an Adventure mode.  Where you need to find some books or something like an emblem like that stuff to make them uncursed like that.  4. Last but not least, you should add more weapons for example:  Pistol,  sword,  injection etc.    If you do that,  it will be super cool and fun.   ThanQ üòÉüëç

It's definatly one of the better (more fun) horror games on the store, but I feel like there could be some more improvements. Firstly I think that if you've completed hard than there should be an (almost) impossible mode. Also minor details such as different textures and Easter eggs would be good. Last, I think that when you escape there should be an outside section where it's still got puzzles but it's more about the atmosphere. (Maybe that could just be for the "impossible mode") but it would make the game a lot more enjoyable. Also maybe a reward for escaping. (For incentive). Thank you and maybe you could take this into consideration :) also new app icon plz

Who doesn't love this game? It's bone chilling and exciting for the whole family (Litterally my whole fam plays this game) it would be cool to have a mode where there was no granny just to explore the house and get a feel for how to escape. Also some weapons to attack granny. Lastly a map of where granny is would be super cool. Good luck!

I love this game but please fix these: 1)Things in the same place when you die 2)The house is bigger 3)Show like a heart beat when Granny is near and not just foot step's. 4) A animal would be cool to help you around the house. 5)More weapons such as, Guns, Knifes, Ect. Lastly that when Granny steps on the bear traps she can get court to and maybe a Granddad! Other then that, This game is amazing and I can't stop playing and be glad to know my hole school is playing it and you hear it every turn you make! Not a joke! Keep it up!  =D

This is an early game with a bunch of potential. I love the game and I'm always playing it but I feel like you can expand the game with these additions. Firstly, why not add in a collectible menu where you can hunt extremely hard-to-find collection of items within Granny's house. Also you could possibly add another, backdoor exit to the house. This would mean being able to escape a different way. Finally you could add another whole game mode where you escape the house in a different way. (You could even add in a whole new mechanic but don't make it too complex!)

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Granny.

Granny keeps you locked in her house.
Now you have to try to get out of her house, but be careful and quiet. She hears everything.
If you drop something on the floor, she hears it and comes running.
You can hide in wardrobes or under beds.
You have 5 days.

Good luck!

The game contains advertisement.

descriptionHTML:
🌀 A Brand new type of game, brought to you by Pinka! 🌀
Unlike our previous games, this game has a new gameplay.
Here you tap 2 or more bubbles of the same color, in order to increase your score.

Features:
* Tap two or more Bubbles of the same color to score.
* Each stage has a different target score you must reach.
* Increasing difficulty level, so you don't get bored.
* An Undo button, so you could rethink your strategy without restarting!
* You don't need to clear the screen of bubbles, only to reach the target score.


★ Tips on Scoring:
- The more bubbles you pop, the higher score you get for each bubble.

Follow us to get news and updates:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pinkagames/
Site: https://www.pinka.biz/

Need to report an issue? Contact us at support@pinka.biz 📧
summary: Pop some Bubbles, and try to reach the target score!
title: Sci-Fi Bubble Breaker

descriptionHTML:
Join the BEST WATER FIGHT of your life! Pack your water balloons. Grab your water guns. Get ready for the mission and get your opponents soaking wet! Plan a sneaky attack and collect the other team’s Coins and Energy. Use them to BUILD AN UNBEATABLE CAMP! And upgrade your Camp as fast as you can to get cool water weapons before your enemies!

Play this brand new, cool water fighting battle builder game – it’s amazing fun!

★★★HOW TO BE THE BEST★★★

★ BUILD YOUR CAMP
Construct an unbeatable Camp. Be quick and set it up before the other teams see you. Set up your Troop Shop, Hero Hall, Tower, Coin Factory, Energy Generator, and more. Level up your Minivan and the buildings in your Camp to get the best weapons and the most Energy to beat the other teams.

★ DEFEND & PLAN ATTACKS
Set up defenses like the Sprinkler, Tower, Puddle, Catapult, Cannon, and more. Protect your Troops, your Camp, and your Coins while you plan a unique water fight strategy! Build up your Troops and lead them to glory! Make the invaders run away!

★ WIN THE WATER FIGHT!
Grab your Water Gun, Slingshooter, Wingsuits, and other weapons. Use the right tactics and head straight into the action! Test your skills and train yourself to perfection in the SINGLE PLAYER Campaign episodes. Attack your enemies and fight in the mega MULTIPLAYER online battles. Progress through the levels and join your Troops with those of other players. That way you can play in even bigger battles! These serious fights are serious fun!

★ COLLECT GOLD & ENERGY
Win the most exciting water battle of the summer and level up! Collect Coins and Energy from other online players and use them to upgrade your Camp. Get your opponents' resources before they get yours or… Sneak behind enemy lines and steal them!

Hurry up! Join kids and adults all over the world and WIN THE WATER FIGHT in this amazing battle builder game with incredible design!

Talking Tom Camp is a free game with the option to purchase items to help you progress through the levels faster.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and third party advertising
- Links that direct users to other apps and Outfit7's websites
- Personalization of content to entice users to play the app again
- The possibility to use and connect with friends via social networks and to use in-app chat
- The option to make in-app purchases
- Items are available for different prices in virtual currency, depending on the current level reached by the player
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchase using real money (level progress, games, in-game functionalities, ads)

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/
Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/

description: Mountain Assault Shooting ArenaReload Your Assault Gun, More Enemy Army Troopers are Coming.Welcome to a brand new shooting game of 2018. The enemy has swarmed in the jungle and are conducting offensive strikes against our country. The armed forces cannot engage with any full fledge frontline pvp battle. Because this could rage war between two countries. But this thing need to be tackled within no time to stop cover strike commando. The enemy has also build up hideouts and are attacking from behind. Now the strategic reply should be given from our side by our commando. For this, the high command has hired a commando to crush the enemy forces. You have to play the character of war strike commando. Your ultimate duty is to retaliate the enemy attack. The jungle is very dense with a lot of cover, so war strike commando needs to be very careful.The gameplay of this game is very thrilling. Players of every age will definitely enjoy with dozens of sequenced frontline pvp battle levels. The initial missions are very easy as compared to last ones. Because the difficulty level increases as you proceed more inside the war strike commando game. You are the only best man to conduct operation in a jungle swarming with hostile forces. There are different weapons in the armory that you can use in cover strike commando game. But only primary gun is available and you have to buy other stuff. The mission tasks are different in each mission of this covert ops commando game. This will definitely test your shooting skills to a whole new level. Furthermore, the gadget includes mini radar to show your position on the ground in this covert ops commando game. You will also get paid with cash on completing each mission. Spend it to buy new weapons, med packs and grenades to win cover strike commando game. You should be prepared every moment, because the enemy is battle hardened and well trained.The controls of this frontline pvp battle game are very easy. Even players of every age will enjoy their spare time with fun. The button placement is ideal in this war strike commando game. You have one section for movement and other to perform actions. The action buttons include fire, reload, change stance and miscellaneous to provide ease of playing this commando pvp shooting game. You can also have a strategic look via radar showing enemy positions. So paly more and enhance your experience in commando pvp shooting games.Best of Luck‚Ä¶! description: The massive strategy war game "Z Max", is a masterpiece! Survive during the apocalypse! Zombies attack! Get lv 10 townhouse when you start playing now! Defence helicopters, and top-tier heroes gifted when you sign in!SettingThe story takes place in 2049, leakage of nuclear power plants results in a large number of human beings being subject to nuclear radiation, turning them into walking dead - humanity has never withstood such an unprecedented challenge!At the same time, humans are competing for limited water resources and fighting each other, the Earth has become a bloody killing field!This world has no order at all, whoever has weapons in hand controls the resources, you can dominate this world! Do you want to take up this challenge?FeaturesA Traditional SLG game mode with even more strategic campaigns and development aspects. Not only can you develop territory for the development of armaments, you can also make helicopters and late-stage chariots. In addition to traditional siege fighting, the game has also added competitive exercises, Fury Road, fortress battles and oasis battles as well as other war games. You will get to know players from all over the world and participate in social games such as Alliance Gathering and Cultivation Base.Gameplay and Functions**Real-time Translation System**Break the barriers of language communication, and support real-time translation of all languages in chatting.**Fly a helicopter**Experience the piloting of helicopters, the pleasure of annihilating a zombie town.**Global Competition**Zombie towns, the four major resource fortresses, global players scramble for the "Doomsday Fortress."**World Rank**Castle level caps will gradually open, creating a more fair game environment.**Alliance Interaction**Expand your alliance territory and kill the Alliance Boss.Collect resources with partners for additional higher yields **War Supplies**Raise your castle level to gain soldiers directly.When losses in battle are too great, trigger war reinforcements and receive large amounts of assistance for free.**Casual PVP**Play with global players anytime, anywhere for honor ranking.Arena fighting will not cause any loss of troops.**Recruit Heroes**With the growth of legendary heroes, greatly enhance the combat capabilities of the troops.Contact Ushttps://www.facebook.com/ZMaxGame
descriptionHTML:
The massive strategy war game "Z Max", is a masterpiece! Survive during the apocalypse! Zombies attack! Get lv 10 townhouse when you start playing now! Defence helicopters, and top-tier heroes gifted when you sign in!

Setting
The story takes place in 2049, leakage of nuclear power plants results in a large number of human beings being subject to nuclear radiation, turning them into walking dead - humanity has never withstood such an unprecedented challenge!
At the same time, humans are competing for limited water resources and fighting each other, the Earth has become a bloody killing field!
This world has no order at all, whoever has weapons in hand controls the resources, you can dominate this world! Do you want to take up this challenge?

Features
A Traditional SLG game mode with even more strategic campaigns and development aspects. Not only can you develop territory for the development of armaments, you can also make helicopters and late-stage chariots. In addition to traditional siege fighting, the game has also added competitive exercises, Fury Road, fortress battles and oasis battles as well as other war games. You will get to know players from all over the world and participate in social games such as Alliance Gathering and Cultivation Base.

Gameplay and Functions
**Real-time Translation System**
Break the barriers of language communication, and support real-time translation of all languages in chatting.

**Fly a helicopter**
Experience the piloting of helicopters, the pleasure of annihilating a zombie town.

**Global Competition**
Zombie towns, the four major resource fortresses, global players scramble for the "Doomsday Fortress."

**World Rank**
Castle level caps will gradually open, creating a more fair game environment.

**Alliance Interaction**
Expand your alliance territory and kill the Alliance Boss.
Collect resources with partners for additional higher yields

**War Supplies**
Raise your castle level to gain soldiers directly.
When losses in battle are too great, trigger war reinforcements and receive large amounts of assistance for free.

**Casual PVP**
Play with global players anytime, anywhere for honor ranking.
Arena fighting will not cause any loss of troops.

**Recruit Heroes**
With the growth of legendary heroes, greatly enhance the combat capabilities of the troops.

Contact Us
https://www.facebook.com/ZMaxGame
developerAddress: FLATRM 603 6F LAWS COMMERCIAL PLAZA 788 CHEUNG SHA WAN ROAD CHEUNG SHA WAN KL
summary: The massive war game "Z Max", is a masterpiece! Survive during the apocalypse!
title: Z Max

description: Join this thrilling 3D ARPG to explore hundreds of quests and tons of fun in Pocket Knights 2! comments: this game is good till about 8 hours in where your waiting days to build anything. Gems are really hard to come by so you have to be wary about how much stock u have. And there's no way to dispose of unwanted items in your warehouse (that I know of) but yeah, it's a catchy game

There is not much of a storage space.  I had been expanding it several times but now that I'm out of  gems can't do much about it.  The ship where i'd supposed to sell unwanted items is not available at the level I currently am.  I can't even fulfill the "costumer" orders as I'm unable to add anymore items to my storage.   I had given up and uninstalled the game.

Super easy to run out of storage, then when you try to sell nobody wants to buy anything even if you price it 75% off total price because they're full too. It would be nice to be able to delete items you can't sell, don't want, or can't use. Really want love the game.

Another game that doesnt allow you to design your city outside their level limits, each with excessive time requirements and costly autocompletes.  Then they have the select few items that are super hard to find essentially requiring you to buy them in order to excel past level 10.  On the good side, graphics are nice, its a little different from all the others.

It's quite annoying that you have to wait so long for all the buildings. Days. And fighting the trolls. Again, days. And that it is so hard to get the flame amulets that you need in order to make progress. It saps all the fun out of the game.
Really...24 hours and three guys for 1 tree! Building takes too long. Fun graphics. would reccomend as a filler game only. Game play and progression too slow to be one of your main games.

description: A better, more fun way to learn and train chess! Master chess through engaging games and interactive lessons with Magnus Carlsen, the World Chess Champion!UNIQUE TRAINING BY CHESS EXPERTSPlay unique, beautiful games crafted by chess experts and game design experts. Deepen your chess skills through premium lessons based on games by Magnus Carlsen and other world-leading chess players. All games and lessons are created by Magnus Carlsen and his team of experienced Grand Masters, all of whom have years of coaching experience.Magnus Trainer makes learning chess easy and engaging for players of all levels. New games are updated and added regularly to bring you the best possible experience, and we're adding new theory lessons every week.Each mini-game has dozens of levels, ranging from beginner to advanced, allowing all chess players, new and experienced, to find a challenging fit to improve their skills. Those who have never played chess before are able to learn the fundamentals in a series of introductory lessons, while more experienced players have access to advanced tactics and strategies, covering a range of end-game essentials.FROM AN AWARD WINNING TEAM  The Magnus Trainer app has been featured in Fast Company, The Guardian, and VG, and is the creation of the team behind the Play Magnus app, winner of several design awards.‚ÄúI‚Äôve always done things a little differently. That is what inspired me to create Magnus Trainer. Chess has always been fun, but this takes learning and training chess to a new level. Magnus Trainer is chess training for everyone!‚Äù‚Äî Magnus Carlsen‚ÄúThe Future of Chess!‚Äù ‚Äî Rob, App Store Reviewer You can also check out our other free app, Play Magnus. Play against Magnus at any age from 5 years and up!FEATURES- Multiple unique, beginner-friendly mini-games, with dozens of levels in each. - Unique and innovative game design ensures essential chess skills are developed in a fun and effective way.- Caters to beginners and advanced players alike. - Learn chess from the greatest player of all time!REACH FURTHER WITH A MEMBERSHIPThe app is free to use, with added benefits for paying members. Members enjoy instant access to all 150+ premium lessons, many exclusive only for members. As a member, you also get infinite lives so you can always keep playing, including exclusive bonus levels. For Magnus Trainer we offer the following subscriptions:- 1 month- 12 months- LifetimeTERMS OF PAYMENTPayment will be charged to your Google Play account after you‚Äôve confirmed a purchase. Subscription to a membership automatically renews, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and the price for renewal will be provided. You can change your subscription settings in Subscriptions in Google Play, or in the More tab in Magnus Trainer when a subscription is active. It is not possible to cancel an active subscription to get a refund of remaining time. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication. descriptionHTML:
A better, more fun way to learn and train chess! Master chess through engaging games and interactive lessons with Magnus Carlsen, the World Chess Champion!


UNIQUE TRAINING BY CHESS EXPERTS

Play unique, beautiful games crafted by chess experts and game design experts. Deepen your chess skills through premium lessons based on games by Magnus Carlsen and other world-leading chess players. All games and lessons are created by Magnus Carlsen and his team of experienced Grand Masters, all of whom have years of coaching experience.

Magnus Trainer makes learning chess easy and engaging for players of all levels. New games are updated and added regularly to bring you the best possible experience, and we're adding new theory lessons every week.

Each mini-game has dozens of levels, ranging from beginner to advanced, allowing all chess players, new and experienced, to find a challenging fit to improve their skills. Those who have never played chess before are able to learn the fundamentals in a series of introductory lessons, while more experienced players have access to advanced tactics and strategies, covering a range of end-game essentials.


FROM AN AWARD WINNING TEAM

The Magnus Trainer app has been featured in Fast Company, The Guardian, and VG, and is the creation of the team behind the Play Magnus app, winner of several design awards.

“I’ve always done things a little differently. That is what inspired me to create Magnus Trainer. Chess has always been fun, but this takes learning and training chess to a new level. Magnus Trainer is chess training for everyone!”
— Magnus Carlsen

“The Future of Chess!”
— Rob, App Store Reviewer

You can also check out our other free app, Play Magnus. Play against Magnus at any age from 5 years and up!


FEATURES

- Multiple unique, beginner-friendly mini-games, with dozens of levels in each.
- Unique and innovative game design ensures essential chess skills are developed in a fun and effective way.
- Caters to beginners and advanced players alike.
- Learn chess from the greatest player of all time!


REACH FURTHER WITH A MEMBERSHIP

The app is free to use, with added benefits for paying members.

Members enjoy instant access to all 150+ premium lessons, many exclusive only for members. As a member, you also get infinite lives so you can always keep playing, including exclusive bonus levels.

For Magnus Trainer we offer the following subscriptions:
- 1 month
- 12 months
- Lifetime


TERMS OF PAYMENT

Payment will be charged to your Google Play account after you’ve confirmed a purchase. Subscription to a membership automatically renews, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and the price for renewal will be provided. You can change your subscription settings in Subscriptions in Google Play, or in the More tab in Magnus Trainer when a subscription is active.

It is not possible to cancel an active subscription to get a refund of remaining time.

Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

For more information:
Terms of Use - http://www.playmagnus.com/terms
Privacy Policy - http://www.playmagnus.com/privacy

Free lessons are added every now and then ‚Äî follow Play Magnus on Facebook and Twitter to be notified when!

description: üçßüçß Download **Ice Slushy Maker: Rainbow Desserts** and run your own dessert shop! Become a top chef of tasty frosty desserts in the form of mouthwatering drinks of various colors and tastes! Well, brace yourself for a new adventure in the world of dessert making games - ‚Äúice slushy games‚Äù are the new wonder among food making games! Use fresh fruit, combine different flavors, add ice cubes and blend away until the perfect frozen slushy is ready! But, that‚Äôs not nearly all that you can do in your slushy shop -  take a look at some of the amazing features:** A variety of ingredients to combine!** Ice cubes of different shapes to add even more fun to the slushy making process!** Realistic drink making process: blender, cups, straws - everything‚Äôs there!** Customize your drink: you choose the flavor of your frozen smoothie, as well as the design of the cup and the straw!** Make a fantastic ice cold slushy every time!** Get the most awesome ‚Äúslushy games for free‚Äù!üçßüçß  Why would you have a regular boring drink when you can create an amazing colorful slushy all by yourself? For an even more incredible experience, pour your fruity ice cold dessert in a cup that you decorated with stickers! To top it all off, choose a straw from an abundance of available designs! üçßüçß Looking for carnival food maker games free with candy and other food? Well, stop looking because ice food maker is here and it's free! Join the ultimate food fest and create a neon slushy that glows in the dark, or a rainbow frozen drink ‚Äì you are the maker of the tastiest carnival food and your slushy making business is growing! Be a crazy chef, create your own sweet recipes for your loyal customers ‚Äì refreshing ice cold slushies are better than cotton candy, ice cream or a snow cone on hot summer days!üçßüçß Classic dessert maker games are sweet and entertaining, but **Ice Slushy Maker: Rainbow Desserts** raises cooking and food making games for girls to a whole new level! Mix and match ingredients of various flavors, combine sweet and sour fruits, or even add some ice cream or chocolate to the mix! This way you can invent  unique new flavors of slushies and smoothies; frozen food making games are the future of delicious dessert cooking games for girls! üçßüçß Learn how to make slushies in the cutest slushy bar and decorate your desserts with chocolate syrup, sprinkles, fruit bits, colorful and glowing straws and more! ‚ÄúFrozen slushy maker games‚Äù enable you to create your own virtual drink without the mess! Have a virtual slushy making party with friends and each of you can make slushies of their dreams! Choose your favorite taste and slushy cup and lid decoration! Making your own food games can turn into a super fun cooking competition ‚Äì start your own smoothie and slushy making contest and share your DIY rainbow slushy masterpieces!üçßüçß It‚Äôs time to begin working in the kitchen and designing one-of-a-kind frozen drinks with silly loop straws and adorable DIY slushy cups! Download **Ice Slushy Maker: Rainbow Desserts** and be the proud maker of virtual ice slushy drinks! üçßüçß  Check out our entire collection of food making, cooking and baking games for girls, boys and all lovers of tasty food and drinks! ‚ÄúCook your own food in the kitchen by yourself‚Äù or design slushy and smoothie cups and invent new flavors of fruity ice cold drinks!
descriptionHTML:
🍧🍧 Download **Ice Slushy Maker: Rainbow Desserts** and run your own dessert shop! Become a top chef of tasty frosty desserts in the form of mouthwatering drinks of various colors and tastes! Make your own slushy and make it taste perfect every time!

🍧🍧 Cooking food like a pro gourmet chef, being a restaurant manager or a masterclass baker sounds like loads of fun, right? Well, brace yourself for a new adventure in the world of dessert making games - “ice slushy games” are the new wonder among food making games! Use fresh fruit, combine different flavors, add ice cubes and blend away until the perfect frozen slushy is ready! But, that’s not nearly all that you can do in your slushy shop - take a look at some of the amazing features:

** A variety of ingredients to combine!
** Ice cubes of different shapes to add even more fun to the slushy making process!
** Realistic drink making process: blender, cups, straws - everything’s there!
** Customize your drink: you choose the flavor of your frozen smoothie, as well as the design of the cup and the straw!
** Make a fantastic ice cold slushy every time!
** Get the most awesome “slushy games for free”!

🍧🍧 Why would you have a regular boring drink when you can create an amazing colorful slushy all by yourself? For an even more incredible experience, pour your fruity ice cold dessert in a cup that you decorated with stickers! To top it all off, choose a straw from an abundance of available designs!

🍧🍧 Looking for carnival food maker games free with candy and other food? Well, stop looking because ice food maker is here and it's free! Join the ultimate food fest and create a neon slushy that glows in the dark, or a rainbow frozen drink – you are the maker of the tastiest carnival food and your slushy making business is growing! Be a crazy chef, create your own sweet recipes for your loyal customers – refreshing ice cold slushies are better than cotton candy, ice cream or a snow cone on hot summer days!

🍧🍧 Classic dessert maker games are sweet and entertaining, but **Ice Slushy Maker: Rainbow Desserts** raises cooking and food making games for girls to a whole new level! Mix and match ingredients of various flavors, combine sweet and sour fruits, or even add some ice cream or chocolate to the mix! This way you can invent unique new flavors of slushies and smoothies; frozen food making games are the future of delicious dessert cooking games for girls!

🍧🍧 Learn how to make slushies in the cutest slushy bar and decorate your desserts with chocolate syrup, sprinkles, fruit bits, colorful and glowing straws and more! “Frozen slushy maker games” enable you to create your own virtual drink without the mess! Have a virtual slushy making party with friends and each of you can make slushies of their dreams! Choose your favorite taste and slushy cup and lid decoration! Making your own food games can turn into a super fun cooking competition – start your own smoothie and slushy making contest and share your DIY rainbow slushy masterpieces!

🍧🍧 It’s time to begin working in the kitchen and designing one-of-a-kind frozen drinks with silly loop straws and adorable DIY slushy cups! Download **Ice Slushy Maker: Rainbow Desserts** and be the proud maker of virtual ice slushy drinks!

🍧🍧 Check out our entire collection of food making, cooking and baking games for girls, boys and all lovers of tasty food and drinks! “Cook your own food in the kitchen by yourself” or design slushy and smoothie cups and invent new flavors of fruity ice cold drinks!
summary: Your very own slushy bar is here!Create delicious drinks in rainbow colors!
title: Ice Slushy Maker: Rainbow Desserts

comments: This is the game I have been searching for. But can't give 5 star because of 2 main reasons. Consume too many data while playing that required fast network and too many bugs... Problems free=5 stars.. What happen? I cannot even play the game now.. I once install and play and later uninstall because of game problem. Now I install and try to play again. I cannot play.. What is the problem? I also want to recover my account too..

The game itself is fun, the prices fair.  2 biggest negatives are as follow. First is very long build timers I mean days to weeks and little to do in between.  The second and most important is that the customer service in this game is horrible and lazy. They are unable to assist with any bugs or game related glitches or errors. Contacting them is pointless as they will just reply everyone with an auto reply that helps in no way and just wastes your time.   If all that sounds acceptable to you try the game. If not then don't. Just know whatever game issue you have they won't help and will just waste your time.

This is the exact definition of a strategy game, the controls are great and its free. You get to choose your own nation which just adds to the strategy, plus whatever you do in a battle can affect the entire battle. I would recommend it to people who want something with strategy and a bit of hardcoreness. The learning curve is quite steep sometimes.
Am Addicted to this yet I hate it because its absolute battery drainer. Developers should fix this asap. When fixed it surely will become top game available. Looking forward for fix please.

Gameplay and graphics is great BUT as you progress you spend more time upgrading units and buildings. Some upgrades take up to a week of upgrading rendering those villagers useless aswell as the rate at which resources comes in as you collect doesnt compensate enough for the costs of upgrades. Its unnecessarily STRETCHED OUT. because of this its a 3 star rating...DONT DOWNLOAD IF YOU HAVE NO PATIENCE. Been playing a year and i dont feel my progress is a representation of the time i have put in. Been playing almost daily!
My mind is blown about this epic game! You can read all the history of units. You can do awesome world wars with your comrades. Five stars for this game (:
description: Grow a flourishing civilization and journey through all of human history as the leader of a mighty Nation!BUILD a unique village of your own design. LEAD loyal citizens from the dawn of antiquity to the modern era. BATTLE cooperatively and competitively with players from across the world. RAID competing Nations for all their good loot!Battle and build a civilization through history as you aim to conquer the world in DomiNations.DOMINATIONS FEATURES:GREAT LEADERS!‚Ä¢ At the new University, consult Leonardo Da Vinci, Catherine the Great, King Sejong and other historic thought leaders.‚Ä¢ Strengthen your Nation with the best war strategy!BRAND NEW EVENTS!‚Ä¢ Accomplish fun limited-time goals based on actual events from history.‚Ä¢ Collect rare rewards to help your Nation advance so they can conquer the world!FROM THE STONE AGE TO THE SPACE AGE‚Ä¢ Lead a colony of early hunters and gatherers on their conquest through the ages from the dawn of civilization to the modern era.‚Ä¢ Design a small civilization and grow it into a thriving metropolis.‚Ä¢ Build historic Wonders of the World, including famous landmarks like the Pyramids of Egypt and the Roman Colosseum.CHOOSE YOUR NATION AND LEAD AN ARMY‚Ä¢ Battle as of one of 8 fearsome Nations on its journey through time.‚Ä¢ Choose one of the great civilizations from history like the Romans, British, Chinese, French, Germans, Japanese, Koreans and Greeks.‚Ä¢ Tackle historic battle campaigns to collect important resources and upgrade your city as you advance through history!‚Ä¢ Each civilization has a special strength to help you build unique units.‚Ä¢ Battle through history and advance your city, like longbowmen, vandals, and the mighty samurai!DISCOVER NEW TECHNOLOGIES‚Ä¢ Legendary game designer Brian Reynolds brings history to life in every era as key advancements from each period in history will help you progress your epic civilization!‚Ä¢ Research each civilization, new materials, invent advanced weaponry, and develop trade to grow a bustling economy.‚Ä¢ Through scientific discovery, strengthen your troops with better equipment, upgrade your buildings and town center with modern materials.‚Ä¢ Create a war strategy to bolster your defenses as you grow stronger. FORM AN ALLIANCE AND WAGE WORLD WAR‚Ä¢ Put your powerful Nation to the ultimate test in PvP combat and raid your enemies‚Äô cities for huge bunches of loot!‚Ä¢ Battle for crucial resources, untold wealth, and total world domination.‚Ä¢ Team up with other skilled rulers and forge an unstoppable Alliance.‚Ä¢ Unleash the full force of your armies with a unique battle strategy to outwit and outlast your opponents in 50-on-50 Alliance warfare.‚Ä¢ Conquer the globe in World War and take home the spoils of war!Build one of history‚Äôs greatest civilizations and develop a battle strategy to conquer opponents. Join an alliance and achieve world domination in DomiNations!Download now to start building your civilizationNOTES:A network connection and iOS 7 or above are required. DomiNations is optimized for iPads and iPhones generation 4S and newer. Playing on an iPhone 4 may result in slower performance and increased load times. The game is free to play, with additional purchases available in-game. If you do not want to make purchases in-game, please disable in-app purchases from your device settings.Privacy Policy:https://www.nexonm.com/privacy-policy/Terms of Service:https://www.nexonm.com/terms-of-use/
descriptionHTML:
Grow a flourishing civilization and journey through all of human history as the leader of a mighty Nation!

BUILD a unique village of your own design. LEAD loyal citizens from the dawn of antiquity to the modern era. BATTLE cooperatively and competitively with players from across the world. RAID competing Nations for all their good loot!

Battle and build a civilization through history as you aim to conquer the world in DomiNations.

DOMINATIONS FEATURES:

GREAT LEADERS!
• At the new University, consult Leonardo Da Vinci, Catherine the Great, King Sejong and other historic thought leaders.
• Strengthen your Nation with the best war strategy!

BRAND NEW EVENTS!
• Accomplish fun limited-time goals based on actual events from history.
• Collect rare rewards to help your Nation advance so they can conquer the world!

FROM THE STONE AGE TO THE SPACE AGE
• Lead a colony of early hunters and gatherers on their conquest through the ages from the dawn of civilization to the modern era.
• Design a small civilization and grow it into a thriving metropolis.
• Build historic Wonders of the World, including famous landmarks like the Pyramids of Egypt and the Roman Colosseum.

CHOOSE YOUR NATION AND LEAD AN ARMY
• Battle as of one of 8 fearsome Nations on its journey through time.
• Choose one of the great civilizations from history like the Romans, British, Chinese, French, Germans, Japanese, Koreans and Greeks.
• Tackle historic battle campaigns to collect important resources and upgrade your city as you advance through history!
• Each civilization has a special strength to help you build unique units.
• Battle through history and advance your city, like longbowmen, vandals, and the mighty samurai!

DISCOVER NEW TECHNOLOGIES
• Legendary game designer Brian Reynolds brings history to life in every era as key advancements from each period in history will help you progress your epic civilization!
• Research each civilization, new materials, invent advanced weaponry, and develop trade to grow a bustling economy.
• Through scientific discovery, strengthen your troops with better equipment, upgrade your buildings and town center with modern materials.
• Create a war strategy to bolster your defenses as you grow stronger.

FORM AN ALLIANCE AND WAGE WORLD WAR

comments: So many glitches that its ridiculous. I haven't had my mega wheel in almost 5 days and customer support is absolutely no help. They referred me to brian rivers and so far he is absolutely no help either! They don't care. Im about to start spreading the word to every one of my friends that I have had join

After putting 30 dollars on poker heat this morning I saw thirty non winning hands in a row. The game was accepting bets for me when I was trying to fold. It is so unrealistic that every other hand is a straight or a flush. I've spent  more money on this game in the past week than I've ever spent In my life. I WILL NEVER PLAY THIS GAME WITH MY MONEY AGAIN. IT'S FUN AND ADDICTIVE, BUT SOMEONE EZ IN IT FOR THEIR OWN POCKET. WSOP IS TEN TIMES BETTER. PLEASE FIX BECAUSE YOU WILL LOOSE MONEY.

Lots of fun. Just as good as wsop if not better. Never bought chips and I'm still having a blast. But, if you go broke plan on opening app ever 4 hours for a free 3k-20k depending on how you rank in leader boards it could be much more but that's what I last remember.

Was skeptical at first as i read the reviews saying it was better than wsop. But i will say this is one of the best poker apps I've played! Love the ranking system. I would love to see 9 player tables but for now this game is great good job guys!

Something is wrong with the game. It Glitches while the dealer is passing out cards. After ever hand has been played the blue level bar which I believe it's the playing points bar, I should be on a higher level and it stopped.  Then I screen shot two hands I played just to have proof to show y'all what else is ridiculous. It should only be one winner not the whole damn table. If I have an Ace and 5 and someone habe an Ace and a 3 and everyone else fold. So, Who should have won the pot?  No straight no nothing just pairs. Please someone answer the question janky ass game.

Great game for not spending real money to play poker. But the people that play on here have know idea how to play poker.  That's the part gets frustrating. To much detail to explain and not enough space to do it. But all and all, a great game except for 90 % of the people playing that think a Queen 5 unsuited is a great hand. It's full of donkeys

descriptionHTML:
THE ULTIMATE MULTIPLAYER DEATH RACE IS HERE

• Experience the thrill of racing and shooting in one game.
• Engage in fast-paced car battles against players from all over the country.

BATTLE IT OUT IN 3 DIFFERENT GAME MODES

• Deathmatch – It’s all-out war against 5 other players. Expect full scale madness and mayhem.
• Team Deathmatch – Work with your teammates to eliminate the other team in this 3v3 battle for supremacy.
• Capture the Point – Outwit the enemy team and control the arena. Only the strongest can survive.

CHOOSE YOUR CAR FOR BATTLE

Choose from 10 different cars – from monster trucks with rapid-firing Gatling guns to hybrid motorcycles with deathrays. It’s your choice. How would you like to eliminate your enemies?

CUSTOMIZE YOUR CAR AND UPGRADE YOUR WEAPONS

Enhance your car’s performance with Skill Points and Chips. But it’s not enough that you kill your enemies. You have to kill them with style. Choose from a wide variety of skins to match your killer persona. Kill them fast while looking good!

THE STORY

The world is in chaos – governments have fallen, cities lie in ruins, and the people struggle to survive. The World Organization of Assassins is leading the plunge into a new dark age, wreaking havoc wherever they go. Equipped with the best cars, outstanding racing skills, heavy firepower, and devil-may-care attitudes, they satisfy their lust for blood, money, and power through their favorite game: the death race.

With the whole world as their battle arena, anyone caught in the crossfire dies. But the death race isn’t just for the assassins. Everyone can join and take home the bounty… that is, if you can survive until the end.

Do you have what it takes to beat the assassins at their own game? Load up your guns, rev up your engines, and get ready for a killer ride.

For more info, please visit our website: http://playoverload.io
Like our Facebook page for more updates: https://www.facebook.com/OverloadGlobal/

This game is really a good and fun game. Unfortunately, the dev ... just like most devs ... open the new server all the time which made players from old servers keep migrating to new one. After 2 weeks playing, you'll start to see empty cities in several nations. The dev nees to stop opening new server and start to merge the old servers. If not, this game won't last long.

The game was amazing. Have a good quality in terms of graphics and smooth controls. However, I encountered problem in my account. After I reach LEVEL 35 my character was totally gone and advices me to create a new one. Please help me regarding with my problem. Any reply are very much appreciated. I will change my ratings after I recovered my character. Thank you.

Time to Uninstall, new server open every week and nothing new about the game. Lag and disconnect every 3-5 min. It's got worst after S17 open.. this game is the same as Loong Craft just different skin. But at least loong craft server is much more sturdy. Please DON'T tell me to check connection or reinstall the game, because I already did it 3 times, connection it's perfectly fine, cuz all my other game I play run just fine.

descriptionHTML:
[Awards]
Golden Plume Award for best picture quality
2017 Mobile Online Game Award for Best Writing
4 Asian Game Award Nominations includes “10 Creative MMORPG”
The Most Expected Mobile Game of Global Kingdom War Players in IGN Research
——The most romantic 3D Kingdom War mobile game in 2017, Sword of Romance

「Background」
Lv Dongxuan, the No.1 master of swordcraft, reincarnated and fell in love with the daughter of the infante but they were finally pulled apart. When they met again, the poor girl was about to die of sickness.
To save her life, Lv took up his sword and killed countless immortals. He finally swore to the god that he would give up his life, instead, the girl will become immortal.
---"I keep seeking my love, but finally I find you and will keep holding your hand..."

[Features]
---Find lover for years---
Wander on earth for thousands of year for the girl in red! The most beautiful marriage in mobile games of 2017, romantic encounter, gorgeous wedding, for you!

---God of Kingdom War---
Will not regret to die for the nation in the Kingdom War! With Command System in game, you can direct the kingdom war yourself. Win the war definitely!

---Anchor plays with you---
Lovely dimples smile, fine eyes blink, exceeding charm awaits your admiring! Anchors from China mainland, Taiwan, Singapore and Malaysia gather in the game to play with you!

---Eminent 3D world---
Holographic of 720 degree brings you an eminent world with Dynamic particle rendering. 6 nations, 12 sceneries are in the map. Wherever you go, fantasy world is there.

---Set the trend with Fashionwears---
Fairy style, Girl-next-door style, Uniform temptation, or swimming suit, there is always a suitable for you.

---Equal drops, fair trade---
With the equal drop rate, non-top-up player can be powerful! Players can trade fairly without any intervention of system

Facebook：@SwordofRomance

descriptionHTML:
Hey, Tankman! Crash of Tanks is a addictive MMO arena tank shooter game with fast-paced PvP action free to enjoy right now!

Play online with people around the world and become the biggest and the toughest player of them all!

Unique features:
— Battle in real time with players from around the world
— Easy steering: control your tank's movement and give shot with two fingers!
— Auto aiming - don't bother with manual targeting anymore!
— Collect different types of perks like puncher, magnet or double shoot
— Pick up metal and make your tank bigger and stronger
— Ranking system - destroy as many tanks as you can and take the lead!
— User powerful auto refill nitro to escape from dangerous places


Explore the arena
Bring your heavy armored tracks in the middle of the canyon full of traps and dead- ends. Watch out for up to 30 enemy players maneuvering simultaneously, that will just look forward to train their strategy on you!

Try the nitro
Use intuitive and easy to learn touch controls to chase, dodge and wreck everything that moves! During the most dynamic actions speed up with nitro button allowing to quickly run away from the danger and avoid the bullets...

Get into the Pocket Mayhem
High action rate is multiplied by dozens of special powers you can have fun with. Smash the alone chests to get boosters like: Big Bang, Shotgun, Invisibility, Speed Booster, Plasma Shield or the Mine Backgun (actually there’s more than 20 types right now).

Fight and compete in Leaderboard
Enjoy real-time multiplayer battles with your friends and climb the leaderboards together to become the greatest tankmen around. Hunt weaker players to steal metal and power-ups from them but be aware of the most skilled foes!

Tool up with power-ups and metal
Collect metal parts for your tank, let it grow and become more powerful and harder to blow up. Grab boosts to rapidly overcome other people and if you’ll lucky, rule the whole arena!

Instant progression system
Enhance your tank during a game with several upgradable abilities. Each time you level up choose from three preselected upgrade options, thanks to that every single game will be unique and fascinating. If you die don’t worry! You have 30 seconds to find and reclaim your corpses to get back half of your previous power!

If you like .io style online games, don’t wait just download and install Crash of Tanks on your device!


Are you ready to join the game? Don't be coward and give it a chance - show how far can you go!

Notice: game requires stable internet connection!

If you have any questions, please visit our site: baadgames.com or contact us via bs@baadgames.com!

descriptionHTML:
Solitaire 2018 – Your community for the popular card game Klondike

Solitaire 2018 is one of the most famous Patiences and is played by young and old people around the world.

Whether clubs, leagues or individual rule sets, Solitaire 2018 Palace gives you all, a true Solitaire 2018 fan needs.

Solve your table and challenge your friends.

Get engaged in a wide range of CLUBS:
o Join or found a club
o Find new friends to play Solitaire 2018 with
o Participate at the club league together
o Meet up to play games with your club mates
o Stay up to date with your club chat

Compete with the best at our LEAGUES:
o You automatically take part in our leagues
o Move up in the player and club league
o Become Quarterly Champion and see your record in the Hall of Fame

Play with your personal preferences and use your own RULE SET:
o Wide range of Klondike rule variations:
o Klondike turn three
o With Joker
o Double deck
o Relaxed mode
o Easthaven
o And many more

Use different CARD DECKS:
o Use our mobile-friendly cards
o Or the traditional Altenburger card decks
o Choose one of these:
o American Deck
o German Deck
o French Deck
o Tournament Deck

With detailed STATISTICS, you can improve your game:
o Immensely detailed statistics for every tableau
o Look at your opponents statistics
o Expectation values show you where you can improve.

You will play only against real players:
You will play Klondike live against real players, but don’t worry, you don’t need to rush because at the end the player with the most efficient solve gets the most points. You will find beginners as well as pros playing with.

Download the App now and for free. Enjoy your game of Solitaire 2018.
Play Solitare Palace now for free and without advertisement.

Have fun and enjoy our game
summary: Solitaire 2018 is a popular and classic single player card game.
title: Solitaire 2018

descriptionHTML:
Project Grand Auto Town Sandbox Beta

This is beta version of game

Please subscribe!
https://www.facebook.com/zulugame/
https://vk.com/zulueg

The game brings us into 90’s. Main character came to his cousin Frankie, as he said: “Sunny city, filled with happiness and loads of money with the huge posh house and a sport car on the background”.
As it turned out, your cousin embellished the situation in his letter, and you were forced to found a job here, so Frankie decided to help you with this and gave to you a taxi driver job with a mean boss.
At work you’ll contact not only with clients, but also with newcomer gangsters, the most dangerous mobs and some conspiracies. But our character has done it before, even worst things happened earlier in his life, he feels sorry for doing it. The main idea of coming to America was to change his life and forget about past.
If you ever wanted to change your life for better and feel yourself gangster, try this masterpiece. But remember, after every action you make the butterfly effect comes, and after all of this actions your life is at stake. So, get ahold of yourself, and stay alive in this battle.

Game features:
- We’ve tried to recreate the atmosphere of the best open world game in history. Bring some nostalgia feels! Mobile game.
- The game with an interesting storyline! Great missions with an entertaining quest.
- Incredible and dynamic 3rd person 3D shooter
- The best game with open world and full freedom, explore all city!
- Photorealistic beauty HD graphics!
- Incredible CGI scenes with action camera elements, that dilutes the gameplay
- Your own time killer. Play wherever you want, at house, work and public transport
- Buy your own real estate
- Best cars simulator! Real characteristics and real cars behavior. Family car, bad boy muscle car or a sport car for a successful man, choose any car you want.
- Compete with the best city drivers. You’re the driver, it’s up to you what happen next
- Enormous ammo choice: mercenaries AK-47, minigun and RPG or a contract killer sniper rifle. Choose your style of the game
- If you’re far away from cellular network or Wi-Fi you can play offline
- Amazing free game
summary: You‚Äôve found the best popular 3D shooter for smartphones!
title: Project Grand Auto Town Sandbox Beta

comments: The game plays good just wish there was more to do. More customization would be nice. And I wish they would let you back the camera off more. And running out of space even with putting in a ton of time and some cash into the game. Try to make the zoo look good and customize it and would spend money to do so, but hard with no space.

Its a fun game till you reach the higher levels. I cant even play the damn thing without having to reload it every 5 seconds. I have trued and tried to tell them by reporting it but they never reapond back. So i DO NOT recommend it

I really like this game and I wanted to love it but just couldn't give it 5 stars.  It's super fun and easy to play but it doesn't give you near enough coins to expand your zoo. You quickly run out of room and it gets increasingly expensive to expand making it nearly impossible. I would play this game way more often if it was easier to earn coins. I started out playing it every day all day long but because I couldn't expand I simply ran out of things to do. Even when purchasing coins i quickly ran out. I hope the developers will make some changes so I can continue to enjoy this game.

Love this game. Very enjoyable and has long-term playability.  My only suggestions would be: 1) make the habitats slightly cheaper as the price increases dramatically as the game progresses 2) add a feature where animals can be sold to other players to decrease waiting times.

Love the games and would give five stars if you could fix the problem with game.  Always crashing. Everytime I and others I know open game have to open it several times to get to work. Always says Zoo Craft is not responding. Please fix problem. Even worse if we get in wifi area. Thanks!

I love this game it's addictive. But land becomes increasingly expensive and zoo tokens are not easily available. In the starting levels money is extremely less. The  kiosks are also very expensive. I hope the makers make these changes as soon as possible.
description: DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES TO RUN A REAL ZOO? As a Zoo Keeper, you‚Äôre handed the keys to a run-down zoo, what will you do? Build your own unique zoo, breed cute animals and discover new species by preforming genetic experiments.Feed and play with your animals in their habitats, raise up animal babies and let visitors buy them as pets.Exhibit more than 120 types of cute animals, from common rabbits, boars and badgers, bizzare koalas, chameleons and monitor lizards to the exotic babirusa and solenodon. Not to mention peculiar mythical animals and the sea creatures in the huge Oceanarium!Play mad scientist in the Laboratory to get new, unusual and rare animals. Grow your collection and expand your zoo!Construct and upgrade zoo kiosks, attractions and emporiums! Design it your way with colorful decorations, roads and walkways to delight visitors and earn profits!Managing a zoo is hard work, complete tasks and special quests to improve your business and earn new achievement statuses.Meet other ZooCraft players and share tips about the game. Animal fun facts, competitions, awesome rewards and a ton of interesting things are waiting for you:https://www.facebook.com/zoocraftgame/https://twitter.com/zoocraftgameDon't forget to follow our handyman Stew on Instagram!https://www.instagram.com/zoocraftgame/ZooCraft is still being actively developed, you can expect lots of updates and great additions to the game in the nearest future. Stay tuned!TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTSOS Version: Android 4.0+Device: 1 GB Ram RecommendedOptimized for: Samsung Galaxy S3Wifi: RequiredTROUBLESHOOTING If the game doesn't start up, runs slowly or crashes, please get in touch and we'll do our best to help.- If you have any questions, use one of the two ways to contact us through our Support system: https://support.creative-mobile.com/ or via e-mail at support@creative-mobile.com
descriptionHTML:
DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES TO RUN A REAL ZOO?

As a Zoo Keeper, you’re handed the keys to a run-down zoo, what will you do?

Build your own unique zoo, breed cute animals and discover new species by preforming genetic experiments.

Feed and play with your animals in their habitats, raise up animal babies and let visitors buy them as pets.

Exhibit more than 120 types of cute animals, from common rabbits, boars and badgers, bizzare koalas, chameleons and monitor lizards to the exotic babirusa and solenodon. Not to mention peculiar mythical animals and the sea creatures in the huge Oceanarium!

Play mad scientist in the Laboratory to get new, unusual and rare animals. Grow your collection and expand your zoo!

Construct and upgrade zoo kiosks, attractions and emporiums! Design it your way with colorful decorations, roads and walkways to delight visitors and earn profits!

Managing a zoo is hard work, complete tasks and special quests to improve your business and earn new achievement statuses.

Meet other ZooCraft players and share tips about the game. Animal fun facts, competitions, awesome rewards and a ton of interesting things are waiting for you:
https://www.facebook.com/zoocraftgame/
https://twitter.com/zoocraftgame
Don't forget to follow our handyman Stew on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/zoocraftgame/

ZooCraft is still being actively developed, you can expect lots of updates and great additions to the game in the nearest future. Stay tuned!


TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS
OS Version: Android 4.0+
Device: 1 GB Ram Recommended
Optimized for: Samsung Galaxy S3
Wifi: Required


TROUBLESHOOTING
If the game doesn't start up, runs slowly or crashes, please get in touch and we'll do our best to help.
- If you have any questions, use one of the two ways to contact us through our Support system: https://support.creative-mobile.com/ or via e-mail at support@creative-mobile.com
recentChanges: - Build a cool sailing ship by playing with the charismatic pirate captain that visits your zoo
- Valentine's Day is around the corner, Start decorating your zoo with an extra bit of love!
summary: Just Zoo It! Build your own Zoo with Cute Animals, Good Graphics & Lots of Fun!
title: ZooCraft: Animal Family

comments: Everything in this game of any value is locked behind a pay wall. The events are underwhelming and most of the updates if not all are made to grab more money. Half the game is behind transactions that will run you hundreds of dollars. The team is not transparent in any way in terms of drop rates for event items forcing you to keep buying daily event chests to get what you want.
I had an account set up with alot of characters but now the server is always busy and I'm not starting fresh and all over. I would rather delete than start fresh again. Not ok at all
What the heck the valentines event didn't finish yet it says 2days until the event finished.and then when i go to adventure all stages dont drop chocolate...and i almost got misaka mikato damn i quit
The editors greedy. You have to spent a lot of money to become stronger. The game sucks really
I rate it bad because i cant play when i go to play when i press the button it says defeat and it won't stop saying defeat

app offers purchases and other in game item it's apparently random however it's  now being looked into by the play store because it's giving player a false range of in game items purchases offer the worst items to make you buy over a period of time to get an item you want and rather than having wasted money people push through to justify having spent their money. The app is a rip-off And the in game support is useless please avoid this game and don't give the people more money for rudeness neglect and poor game quality.

comments: I've just downloaded it and it just freezes every time I open the game
I upgraded game and now dont work

The developer corrected some major issues and got things back up and running. They also sent out very generous compensation for the down time, and that was a great gesture. The game is simple to learn, fun to play and very challenging once you get into the upper power levels. I recommend this to anyone who is looking for a rewarding game that will challenge you.

The game still has many bugs. Easter eggs are removed without warning. Current glitch/feature of all rss being consumed, not just meat  by troops makes the game virtually unplayable. It's pay to play folks. Devs, if you put the eggs back in, you will generate more revenue.

I loved playing it but now it tells me there is an update. I click the update button and it brings me to the store. My options are open or uninstall the game. Hard to like a game if you can't play it. And now I get warnings that I am being attacked and can't log in to protect my troops. Hope they fix this game soon or it will be the death of this game.
Since the update last week I haven't been able to log in at all anymore it won't go past the log in screen that game is dead to me now well dieing if its not fixed soon I will move on
description: Tribes Age is a FREE MMO strategy game. Here you can experience the most primitive, funny hunting and battles! Find your clan mates, and start your prehistoric life in the uncivilized world!Game Features:The Most Exciting Tribal Warfare-Outposts can be freely built in anywhere, getting stronger is a simple way to against resistant.-Seamless zooming makes it easy to navigate in the world!-Players in every country can fight against each other simultaneously. Try to make reliable friends, and protect your honors altogether!Various & Funny Troop Collocations-Default Troop Types: Warrior, Beastmaster, Shaman and Demolisher. Every type of troop has its unique talents, yet yield certain weak points.-16 unique types of troops in total! Try various combinations to optimize your battle strategy timely.Unique & Outstanding Gameplay-Collect unique heroes, utilize their talents in PvP battles as well as exploring the world.- Each hero has its unique skill and ways of attack, they can learn from each other when grouped in certain combinations. eventually, it makes weak overcoming the strong possible. Create Your Own Clan-Join a clan or create your own, share your thoughts, ideas and help each other.-Hunt together; defeat prehistoric monsters for sweet rewards!-Call up the clan members, initiate epic wars and conquer the Wonder to become the great chief of the Tribes Age!Facebook Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/Tribes-Age-180520095838759/Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/545840965764783/
descriptionHTML:
Tribes Age is a FREE MMO strategy game. Here you can experience the most primitive, funny hunting and battles! Find your clan mates, and start your prehistoric life in the uncivilized world!

Game Features:

The Most Exciting Tribal Warfare

-Outposts can be freely built in anywhere, getting stronger is a simple way to against resistant.
-Seamless zooming makes it easy to navigate in the world!
-Players in every country can fight against each other simultaneously. Try to make reliable friends, and protect your honors altogether!

Various & Funny Troop Collocations

-Default Troop Types: Warrior, Beastmaster, Shaman and Demolisher. Every type of troop has its unique talents, yet yield certain weak points.
-16 unique types of troops in total! Try various combinations to optimize your battle strategy timely.


Unique & Outstanding Gameplay
-Collect unique heroes, utilize their talents in PvP battles as well as exploring the world.
- Each hero has its unique skill and ways of attack, they can learn from each other when grouped in certain combinations. eventually, it makes weak overcoming the strong possible.

Create Your Own Clan
-Join a clan or create your own, share your thoughts, ideas and help each other.
-Hunt together; defeat prehistoric monsters for sweet rewards!
-Call up the clan members, initiate epic wars and conquer the Wonder to become the great chief of the Tribes Age!

Facebook Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/Tribes-Age-180520095838759/
Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/545840965764783/

summary: Experience the most primitive, funny hunting, and start your prehistoric life!
title: Tribes Age

Enjoy!!
