descriptionHTML:
Let's escape from the door by exploring the world like a picture book.


■ Features ■
· It is an escape game that solves a mystery together with a cute character.
· Escape game It is a game that even beginners can enjoy.
· Go around various stages, use items or solve problems and escape.
· Clear room will become lively.
· All six stages. There are plenty of extras.
· Healing music. Turn on BGM and play around.
· Once you clear the stage you can play many times later.
· You can play all free.


■ It is recommended for ■
· I love healing games.
· I like escape games.
· I like kawaii games.
· I love cute characters and animals.
· I want to play freely and free of charge.
· I want to collect items.


■ How to play
· It is a simple operation with only tap.
· Let's tap where I was interested.
· Press and hold the item in the item box to enlarge it.
· When the number of items increases, swipe the item box left or right to select it.
· Tap the gear icon on the screen to open the menu.
· You can see hints and answers from the menu. (* Required video viewing)


■ Note ■
Depending on the model, there may be times when it seems to stop on the white screen at the beginning of the stage.
There is a possibility that it takes time to load, so it may start when you wait for a while.

descriptionHTML:
Resort tycoon is a beautiful resort simulation that tests your time and resource management skills. Upgrade your hotel with all the latest amenities, open restaurants, kitchens, serve varieties of drinks and much more because your customers deserve the best!

Kick start your hotel management career, keep the customers happy and earn money to buy resorts all over the paradise city and create your own chain of dream hotels. But don’t forget to keep your business strategies updated by adjusting your own demand and the profit’s for the items you sell in your supermarket.

Carry enough burgers, sandwiches, Pizza, Burger, drinks and much more delicious items to cater daily customer demands. Open swimming pool and dress up customers. Soothe impatient guests before they get angry. As resort’s popularity increases, you earn more money. Experience the situation and strategy of real resort business.

Create a resort tycoon Cafeland story of yours who aspired and established a successful hotel business and eventually became the great Resort Tycoon.

Game available in: English, French, Spanish, Russian, and Thai.

Game Features:

• FREE TO PLAY, lifelong!
• Colorful and vivid graphics, also plenty of facilities and decoration items available!
• Simple, intuitive and addictive game-play.
• Let’s you build and maintain your dream family vacation hangout.
• Allows you to play offline and serve your guests without wasting data.
• Optimized for many devices including the latest mobile phones / tablets.

Players can pay real money for in-game currency and to enhance the game-play.

The quicker you serve food, happier the customers will be. Each customer will pay money for their stay, use the money to buy upgrades, decorations or to open new island resorts in paradise city and convert your resort to a super mall.

Expand your motel by buying more rooms for the guests to stay in and renovate it with several types of decorations such as paintings, fountains, etc.

Buy and upgrade diner stands to serve various items to the customers – ice creams, soft drinks, street food, etc. in your supermall.

Game is packed with:

Real Simulation Experience
• Enjoy every bit of managing your resort and watch it grow before your eyes. Your actions define how you'll be earning.

Stunning Visuals
• Lively characters and beautiful decors elevate the visual quality of the game and take it to another level.
• Detailed interiors and objects are a visual treat.

Many Decors & Upgrades
• Beautify your resort and make it stand out.
• Upgrade the resort and give your guests an experience that is a class apart

Helpful Boosters
• Speed up diner service and dash your way out to tips!
• Space crunch in your cart? Keep that extra can of soda or a sandwich ready!

Anything Else? Well...
• Establish your very own chain of resorts; over 5 unique resorts to expand your resort tycoon chain to.
• VIP Guests – You have to pay special attention to them in your restaurant. They are pretty generous!
• Soothing music ensuring a pleasant stay at the resort

Download now, for free!


---------------------------------------------

IMPORTANT CONSUMER INFORMATION:

The game respects your privacy, does not store any personal information and does not allow you share this information.

We do require a few additional Permissions to function:

1) READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE & WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
These permissions are needed to read/write data of downloaded content for new resorts.

2) ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
These permission is needed to show suitable ad content for targeted user for better ad experience

3) ACCESS_WIFI_STATE & ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
This permission is required to check internet connectivity to download new content of new resorts.

Resort Tycoon is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. Game may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.

---------------------------------------------

title: Resort Tycoon : Hotel Paradise Story

comments: This game does not disappoint! I love everything these developers do ... I get so excited when I see a new game they have released. If I had one complaint it would be that the games are TOO SHORT! We need more than 18 levels ... or more details and challenges within the levels. Keep up the great work!

It asks us money after level 10. This is not the way u can guys. This should be free. The people who can't pay, how they could play this very much interesting game. Plz guys add more free levels. In fact plz make the whole game free of cost.

Really enjoyed. Had to watch vids a couple of times as a bit baffled, and would have liked a hint option first before having to go for the full answer. I rarely pay to get remaining levels, but I thought this game was worth the gamble. I wasn't disappointed.
Complete garbage. This game is listed as a free to play but its just click bait. Play 10 easy short levels then expect people to pay for every two levels. Completed the first 10 in under 30 minutes.
The pipe puzzle has at least two solutions but the game only accepts one, which can be confusing and misleading. Otherwise great graphics but not very challenging
I liked the game. Not too challenging but passed the time ok. I'm not impressed that there's only a few levels after I paid for the VIP. A little more bang for my buck would be better appreciated.

comments: It was great until the new update.  Upon returning to the main island after exploring the big new island, l noticed EVERYTHING is gone.  I hoped one of the two updates would have fixed it.  I really hope it can be fixed, if not I will find another game.  I have spent too much time (and money) to start over again.

STILL WAITING FOR UPDATE.... BEEN 2 WEEKS ALREADY...... ALSO I SEE THAT I CANNOT SEE EVERYTHING IN FRONT OF ME UNTIL YOU GET TO IT.... DEFINITELY A CL ITCH!  Please lease I love this game but can't wait for the new update. You promised last week that the update will be available this week..... Please update.  WHEN WILL THE NEW UPDATE BE AVAILABLE PLEASE????????CAN'T WAIT FOR IT!         Please explain how do I make a crowbar????? When is new update available??? Love this game and can't wait for all the new exiting adventures

Game is clearly not finished yet- would probably be worth stating that the game is in development.  Few Things that definately need addressing: Car durability - everything wears out too quickly Durability of items in general - prevents me spending any money as it wears out so quickly  Weapon damage - 6 or seven shots to take down a deer is pretty extreme.  Comms about the update - it makes it sound like more has been done that is actually there  New island - doesn't have that much to do or find. Basically all available on the original island  Clarity on skills - needs to much clearer what skills are needed  It's got lots of potential though

This was my favorite game that I played for over a year and spent many hours on. With each update, all my crafting, supplies and building are gone. The developers will not fix this and are only willing to refund money spent on the game. Players spent hours gathering materials and crafting items along with building and get noting in return. The half written rushed coding destroys all your game play and takes away everything you have on the game, I'm done trying. It's a shame because this game had real potential. The developers basically screw up and steal all your work, I do not recommend this game for any serious players. Btw, I had hundreds of items now gone, upgrades and electricity are also gone along with gardens, foods and everything else. The developers have NOT fixed this, stay away.

Finally, after weeks of waiting, I was excited for the recent update. Unfortunately it's a bit of a let down. The new island is not as expected. I spent a few hours exploring only to find there is nothing new there..it's just a big empty island with a few useless gas stations, big metal boxes that nothing can be done with and an abundance of stone, wood, bananas, and water..all of which is just as easily found on the original island. I love the idea of the added boats and another truck, however these items just use more resources without making it easier to obtain new resources. There is also still a lot missing..Steel, rubber, leather, aluminum, and redwood just to name a few. It's also basically impossible to maintain the vehicle without spending actual money. Animals still require many bullets before actually killing them. Food is difficult to obtain and hunger and thirst are constant..There is no reason I should have to eat 6 steaks to fill my hunger. And there are many features that say you need a higher level, but no way of telling what level or what stats are needed.. it still takes way too many resources to complete anything. By the time I've collected enough wood and metal to build anything, I have to use that wood and metal to repair my tools to gather more material to build..And the cycle continues. If these issues are corrected the game would be great, but as for now it's just not quite there..
I like it but since I got the update most of the tree's are transparent which makes it very hard to gather the wood I need.

comments: i would have rated it higher til i was forced to start a new mission with Pooh Bear. all of my characters are having to do things not for the usual money to used to buy things i need to upgrade and expand my kingdom, they now earn Pooh bucks for the next 20 some odd days. not everyone likes to play a game that has forced side quests. i dont like some characters cost a lot of actual money to unlock. If a child is playing this and wants their favorite character, parents are having to shell out money to keep them happy. it should be either buy it or earn it.

Grafics are amazing!!! Constantly wanting you to buy gems that help you move along in the game.  You can send characters on tasks that are suppose to drop needed parts you need to advance and they rarely drop. Not sure why different updates cause the game to crash more often. But again,  when it works, the Grafics are really cute!

It was fun until it won't stay on long enough to do anything.  I have started it 6times this morning!!!  This has been going on for awhile but today crazy.. I am going to uninstall it if there is no fix soon..  I have played this game going on 2yrs.. very frustrating..it runs even worse since y The stupid update..thanks for nothing!!!!

This game is really cute and fun. I greatly enjoy it. However, the resource cost jumps quickly to ridiculous rates and there is no ability to assist friends. I could get over the resource cost if friend visiting and helping were to be added. That would make this review go from a 3 to a 5.

Awesome game. It's Disney and you don't have to stay on it all day unless you want too.lol. The only issue I would have is that it is very difficult to get some characters. I kept trying for Mulan all the way thru when she was available and never got her. Then i got treasure chests and got alot of stone dragons and no Mulan either. But I still love my Disney game. Been playing almost since it came out. Thank you for a wonderful game.

You guys need to up the gems for watching videos 1 gem is just not enough, you guys are making it so hard to collect characters, it takes months just to collect a character worth gems it is ridiculous. Also for some reason since the pooh bear update began i keep getting kicked out of game play it is getting frustrating coz i actually enjoy playing this game. It brings out my inner child

description: Rubpix is a picture-forming sliding block puzzle game from the creator of Pretentious Game. "Most Promising Game in the Indie Prize" Casual Connect Singapore 2014. It's as much awesome as simple it is. Imagine a Rubik's cube with pixels, hence RubPix :D ! Your goal is to recreate a picture depicted above your RubPix. As you may expect some are pretty tricky. 150 puzzles, gotta solve them all! "Game Slam participant in Casual Connect Singapore 2014" "Kotaku-featured 4x4 pixel art by David Stoll"

Rubpix is a picture-forming sliding block puzzle game from the creator of Pretentious Game.

"Most Promising Game in the Indie Prize" Casual Connect Singapore 2014.

It's as much awesome as simple it is. Imagine a Rubik's cube with pixels, hence RubPix :D !

Your goal is to recreate a picture depicted above your RubPix.
As you may expect some are pretty tricky.

150 puzzles, gotta solve them all!

"Game Slam participant in Casual Connect Singapore 2014"
"Kotaku-featured 4x4 pixel art by David Stoll"

Just to add another side of the game so the user is not doing the same thing all the time. But as is its a good game and can b won without purchases. Great job devs keep up the good work.

Fun, easy game. You build up your horse through training and upgrades. At a certain point you can race against other players and bet on your horse. You get to name your first horse. I wish you could name all your horses. I also wish you could race all your horses. As it is once your next tier horse is ready, the lower tier horse is done.
played alot of horse racing games this one beats all. graphics are good and gameplay is easy. its a hard challenge if you dont know what your doing. would live to have more than 10 energy though

comments: I wouldn't say that this bg app is difficult. It's currently limited in features. Skill expectations are low, but it's great to relax with. Love the "king for a day" feature, gives you a goal beyond just winning the current game.  It currently only supports single game mode which is fun for a quick game, but I prefer more of a challenge. So, I'm hoping that they'll add more features in the future. A 3-pt match with the use of doubling cube would be nice. Only drawback is that players don't appear to be very experienced and getting a game with a bet higher than 2600 is impossible, which makes this boring for me. Was just promised tournament mode if I update. I reinstall to latest version. Not even the promise of tournament mode now. Just lost a üåü for that. App lost another üåü. Tourney room is back. I'll be d***ed if I'm paying $5 to play it though.

Too many connectivity issues. For the past few days I keep disconnecting after the first round of every game. My internet connection is fine overall but I get an error message and lose the game AND coins. So then I have to watch a couple of 30s ads just to be able to play ONE game which also disconnects.

description: The game is a simulator of shooting a pistol Beretta 92. The main feature of the ¬´Pistol shooting¬ª game that distinguish it from other similar games is a choice of aiming mode with ¬´alignment of a front sight¬ª. What is ¬´alignment of a front sight¬ª? In most simulations of fire, when aiming, you just have to combine the sight of the guns weapon with the target and shoot. This pistol sight consists of two parts, front sight and rear sight with a cut. To shoot accurately it is necessary to put the front sight on the center of the cut and its top end is aligned to the top plane of rear sight. This is called alignment of the front sight. Keeping this mutual location of sighting devices it is necessary to combine the guns sight with the target and shoot. In game settings you can choose one of the two aiming modes: 1. The alignment of the sights is disabled: In this mode, with the joystick combine the sight of the pistol with the target. Releasing the joystick to shot. 2. The alignment of the sights is enabled: In this mode, in addition to aiming sight with the joystick you must also align the front sight. Align the front sight by tilting the device. Shooting in this mode is more complex, but this method of aiming is closer to the aiming when shooting from real gun. Before shooting you can choose the type of the target. There are 4 types of targets: - Standard paper target - Ceramic rotary target - Banks - Candles For each sighting and each target the best result of the shooting is stored. Number of hits and time of the shooting are taken into account when determining the best result. Therefore, even if maximum number of points is reached, the result can be improved by reducing time of the shooting. This simulation game will help you learn the fundamental principles of aiming pistol and other guns equipped with mechanical iron sights and learn to shoot accurately.
descriptionHTML:
The game is a simulator of shooting a pistol Beretta 92.
The main feature of the «Pistol shooting» game that distinguish it from other similar games is a choice of aiming mode with «alignment of a front sight». What is «alignment of a front sight»? In most simulations of fire, when aiming, you just have to combine the sight of the guns weapon with the target and shoot. This pistol sight consists of two parts, front sight and rear sight with a cut. To shoot accurately it is necessary to put the front sight on the center of the cut and its top end is aligned to the top plane of rear sight. This is called alignment of the front sight. Keeping this mutual location of sighting devices it is necessary to combine the guns sight with the target and shoot.
In game settings you can choose one of the two aiming modes:
1. The alignment of the sights is disabled:
In this mode, with the joystick combine the sight of the pistol with the target. Releasing the joystick to shot.
2. The alignment of the sights is enabled:
In this mode, in addition to aiming sight with the joystick you must also align the front sight. Align the front sight by tilting the device. Shooting in this mode is more complex, but this method of aiming is closer to the aiming when shooting from real gun.
Before shooting you can choose the type of the target. There are 4 types of targets:
- Standard paper target
- Ceramic rotary target
- Banks
- Candles
For each sighting and each target the best result of the shooting is stored. Number of hits and time of the shooting are taken into account when determining the best result. Therefore, even if maximum number of points is reached, the result can be improved by reducing time of the shooting.
This simulation game will help you learn the fundamental principles of aiming pistol and other guns equipped with mechanical iron sights and learn to shoot accurately.

1. LUDO PLAYERS: Each player gets 4 tokens(4 Player): Red, Blue, Green, Yellow.
2. LUDO GOAL: All tokens must make a full round of the board and enter into finish line.
- FINISH LINE is located at the center of the board.
3. LUDO WIN: The player, who gets all four tokens to finish line, is the winner & Become King Ludo Player.
4. LUDO DICE(DIE) ROLL: To Make Move. Be Ludo Dice King 2018
5. LUDO DICE(DIE) ROLL SIX: To Start: Move Out of home by ROLL A SIX.(On dice or die)
6. LUDO COMPETITION: While moving, if other player’s token comes on the same square, then your token will be sent back home.
- Hit other players to send them home.
7. LUDO RACE: Race Ludo Players from the home to the finishing point.
- Be king of the board game.

Additive and helpful. Its not an over night cure so people expecting that need help instead lol. It doesn't deserve a low rating. Yes theres add but it's to be expected with a free game. Having adult a.d.d and huge memory issues.. i can i liked this game. 100 doors is anther good one.

It's fun. My problem is on the attention one we are suppose to click stop once the red dot is on the brain and I do. There is plenty of time to click it  but it tells me i missed it. No matter how many times I click it while the red dot is still on the brain. If I press it 10 times then the screen that tells me I've failed comes up 10 times. Driving me insane.

I love it!!! The games are interesting. Now I am on "memory match" game which was initially locked and it keeps on freezing and promotes me to next level without me completing the level well. Besides that, I would highly recommended it to others, it's worth installing.

This is completely addicting in a way I've never felt before! I can still walk away from it but the concepts seem so simple yet provide enough challenge to make me think of it even when I'm not playing! It's delightful to say the least!
description: Brain Trainer app to quick exercise to your brain short term memory, concentration, focus , speed & accuracy.it has 15 type of brain training games. ‚óÜ  Multitasking brain training . ‚óÜ  Quick Search brain training . ‚óÜ  Math brain training . ‚óÜ  Focus brain training . ‚óÜ  Colors Vs Brain ‚óÜ  Memory Power Training ‚óÜ  Left Brain Vs Right Brain  ‚óÜ  Remember Faces  ‚óÜ  Concentration ‚óÜ  Quick Decision ‚óÜ  Grid Memory Challenge ‚óÜ  Listening Memory ‚óÜ  Word Memory Challenge ‚óÜ  Concentration Plus 1) Multitasking skill: -  Increase your brain multitasking capability by playing this.Questions will be displayed at a time in 2 panels. You have to get target score to finish the level by managing not to loose 3 chances on any panel and with in 1 minute..  Try to get max score on each level.. 2) Quick Search skill :   Increase your brain searching skills by playing this.Blast the balls from high number to low number with in time limit. 5 seconds penalty on each wrong click. 3) Math Skill : Add,subtract,multiply numbers fast in balloon solver. The objective of the game is to pop the balloons with correct answer.     4) Focus Skill:  Increase your focus by controlling your attention. Number will be displayed with rapid pace. Tap the screen after every number except do not tap on withhold number.5) Color Vs BrainColor List will be displayed for few seconds and colors will be be shuffled, remember the colors by putting full concentration before shuffle and arrange them in same order by dragging the items6) Memory Power    Remember the objects which displays only few seconds and reenter them in same sequence.This exercise defiantly challenges you memory power 7) Left Vs Right Brain  Balancing Left and Right brains are very important, playing this game will train your brain on balancing activities   If you are not satisfied with your results, Play this game daily 5-10 min. You may see better results.
descriptionHTML:
Brain Trainer app to quick exercise to your brain short term memory, concentration, focus , speed & accuracy.
it has 15 type of brain training games.

◆ Multitasking brain training .
◆ Quick Search brain training .
◆ Math brain training .
◆ Focus brain training .
◆ Colors Vs Brain
◆ Memory Power Training
◆ Left Brain Vs Right Brain
◆ Remember Faces
◆ Concentration
◆ Quick Decision
◆ Grid Memory Challenge
◆ Listening Memory
◆ Word Memory Challenge
◆ Concentration Plus

1) Multitasking skill: -

Increase your brain multitasking capability by playing this.Questions will be displayed at a time in 2 panels. You have to get target score to finish the level by managing not to loose 3 chances on any panel and with in 1 minute.. Try to get max score on each level..

2) Quick Search skill :

Increase your brain searching skills by playing this.Blast the balls from high number to low number with in time limit. 5 seconds penalty on each wrong click.

3) Math Skill : Add,subtract,multiply numbers fast in balloon solver. The objective of the game is to pop the balloons with correct answer.

4) Focus Skill:
Increase your focus by controlling your attention. Number will be displayed with rapid pace. Tap the screen after every number except do not tap on withhold number.

5) Color Vs Brain
Color List will be displayed for few seconds and colors will be be shuffled, remember the colors by putting full concentration before shuffle and arrange them in same order by dragging the items

6) Memory Power
Remember the objects which displays only few seconds and reenter them in same sequence.
This exercise defiantly challenges you memory power

7) Left Vs Right Brain
Balancing Left and Right brains are very important, playing this game will train your brain on balancing activities


If you are not satisfied with your results, Play this game daily 5-10 min. You may see better results.
summary: Train your brain for memory,concentration,focus,speed & accuracy. Download now!
title: Brain Training

'Infinity' is right. This game is in serious need of balancing. After doing one challenge run I had enough gold to power up my guy 500% stronger than base, and just walked through the rest of the repetitive game, that consists of 3 sentences of nigh irrelevant story. Thumbs down.
Great idea that's poorly executed. There is no way to save progress and I'm not really into sitting here and redoing everything I've already done countless times. Uninstalled.

Great idea with eternal succeeding. Cool effects but you won't see them because you'll be concentrated on the bottom part of the screen. Until you girlfriend takes the phone to play. Interesting and intense gameplay. Meta game is cool too. Graphic style is ok, but could be richer, UI especially (thick borders aren't cool). Maybe some narrative enrichment or extra meta gameplay could make overall experience better.
just add more epic music and sound effect
Fun little twitch game, don't expect the depth of an RPG such as EverQuest

description: Dive into the hidden wizard world, find and catch fantastic beasts and find out where to find them. A development game for children in augmented reality, with cognitive information about the fantastic creatures of our planet.In the game Pocket Wizard GO you can feel like a real hunter on fantastic beasts. Track the creatures with the built-in radar and follow the trail. Find all the hidden magic beasts in your city!You have to look for and catch the disguised fantastic animals in the real world with the help of a radar and a smartphone camera. Move through the streets of the city, parks and squares, even inside buildings and with the help of radar find hidden beasts. You can meet a predator like a griffin or a fire tiger right at home! Or catch a huge saber-toothed or a small magic fox at the entrance! You can also meet the phoenix, pegasus and many others. As soon as you track down the fantastic beast, rather throw a red ball into it, so it will fall into your phone. Collect all the mystical creatures in your collection!Pocket Wizard GO uses augmented reality technology and requires you to move around to find wizard animals. Be careful near the roadway, remember safety!
descriptionHTML:
Dive into the hidden wizard world, find and catch fantastic beasts and find out where to find them. A development game for children in augmented reality, with cognitive information about the fantastic creatures of our planet.

In the game Pocket Wizard GO you can feel like a real hunter on fantastic beasts. Track the creatures with the built-in radar and follow the trail. Find all the hidden magic beasts in your city!

You have to look for and catch the disguised fantastic animals in the real world with the help of a radar and a smartphone camera. Move through the streets of the city, parks and squares, even inside buildings and with the help of radar find hidden beasts. You can meet a predator like a griffin or a fire tiger right at home! Or catch a huge saber-toothed or a small magic fox at the entrance! You can also meet the phoenix, pegasus and many others. As soon as you track down the fantastic beast, rather throw a red ball into it, so it will fall into your phone. Collect all the mystical creatures in your collection!

Pocket Wizard GO uses augmented reality technology and requires you to move around to find wizard animals. Be careful near the roadway, remember safety!
summary: Find fantastic beasts in real world! Catch them with of your phone camera.
title: Pocket Wizard GO: Fantastic Beasts

description: The breakaway hit Road Drivers: Legacy returns with more dynamic arcade racing road trip. Hop in the sports elite car of your dreams and race down the legendary high speed highways in Road Drivers: Legacy!Cop pursuits and shooting! Be the best!Road Drivers: Legacy is a milestone in the genre of endless arcade racing. Drive your car through highway traffic, earn cash, upgrade your car and buy new ones. Try to be one of the fastest drivers in the world. Endless racing is now redefined!Try cool cars in city!This offline racing adventure challenges you to race, speed and crash your way to victory while you protect your turf and uncover a string of mysterious accidents and deaths in the racing community.Drive via dumb cars, take a long road trip.Sport and Muscle CARSChoose from a selection of 30+ cars from the hottest manufacturers like BMW, Chevrolet, Dodge, Ford, Honda, Infiniti, Jaguar, Koenigsegg, Mazda, Nissan SkylineTry out the best game in 2017!KEY FEATURES‚ú≠ Stunning 3D graphics‚ú≠ Smooth and realistic car handling‚ú≠ Different new cars to choose from: sport cars, roadsters, muscle cars!‚ú≠ Detailed environment‚ú≠ Rich types of NPC traffic including trucks, buses and SUVs.‚ú≠ Basic customization through paint and other‚ú≠ Online Leaderboards and AchievementsGAMEPLAY‚ú≠ Use steering wheel, accelerometer or game buttons to steer‚ú≠ Press brake button to slow down‚ú≠ Buy better cars to have better handlingTIPS‚ú≠ The faster you drive the more scores you get‚ú≠ When driving over 100 kmh, overtake cars closely to get bonus scores and cash‚ú≠ Driving in opposite direction in two-way mode gives extra score and cashAre you ready for the challenge? descriptionHTML:
The breakaway hit Road Drivers: Legacy returns with more dynamic arcade racing road trip. Hop in the sports elite car of your dreams and race down the legendary high speed highways in Road Drivers: Legacy!

Cop pursuits and shooting! Be the best!

Road Drivers: Legacy is a milestone in the genre of endless arcade racing. Drive your car through highway traffic, earn cash, upgrade your car and buy new ones. Try to be one of the fastest drivers in the world. Endless racing is now redefined!
Try cool cars in city!

This offline racing adventure challenges you to race, speed and crash your way to victory while you protect your turf and uncover a string of mysterious accidents and deaths in the racing community.
Drive via dumb cars, take a long road trip.
Sport and Muscle CARS
Choose from a selection of 30+ cars from the hottest manufacturers like BMW, Chevrolet, Dodge, Ford, Honda, Infiniti, Jaguar, Koenigsegg, Mazda, Nissan Skyline
Try out the best game in 2017!


KEY FEATURES
✭ Stunning 3D graphics
✭ Smooth and realistic car handling
✭ Different new cars to choose from: sport cars, roadsters, muscle cars!
✭ Detailed environment
✭ Rich types of NPC traffic including trucks, buses and SUVs.
✭ Basic customization through paint and other
✭ Online Leaderboards and Achievements

GAMEPLAY
✭ Use steering wheel, accelerometer or game buttons to steer
✭ Press brake button to slow down
✭ Buy better cars to have better handling

TIPS
✭ The faster you drive the more scores you get
✭ When driving over 100 kmh, overtake cars closely to get bonus scores and cash
✭ Driving in opposite direction in two-way mode gives extra score and cash

Are you ready for the challenge? Show your friends what a speed demon looks like!


Road Drivers: Legacy will be updated constantly. Please rate and give your feedback for further improvement of the game.
recentChanges: A long-awaited update with cops and shooting!
Just try it out and have fun!
summary: Play the best racing in 2017! Cop pursuits and shooting! Be the best!
title: Road Drivers: Legacy

descriptionHTML:
World Connect is a puzzle game that will delight the traveler in you.
Start your global tour and collect the souvenirs as much as you can. If you combine four blocks of the same types, you can discover a new landmark. Then, you can move on to the next destination.
Whenever you clear a destination, you can collect souvenirs of the country. How many souvenirs can you find?
Match the Blocks to travel all over the world. Enjoy your trip!

◆ Easy to play hard to master.
* Touch and move the blocks on the board. Match four of them together to combine them and discover a new Landmark. Can you find them all?
* Move and merge as many blocks as you can. But beware each time you make a move: otherwise, you might find yourself stuck with random building blocks. Be a smart tourist and plan your trip strategically to solve the puzzle and visit the next destination.
* Build a final landmark that represents each and every destination of the world, and accomplish a worldwide success and an unforgettable tour.

◆ Strategies based on various items
* World Connect require users to come up with their best strategy skills. Connect the blocks and rediscover the historical treasures of each country.
* The swap item can change the position of two blocks of your choice supporting you to match cells better.
* The bomb item completely deletes the 3 cells of your choice helping you from cleaning up the board. But try to avoid wrecking important building block though.
* The upgrade items will level up a cell of your choice. Who never dreamt of building the Eiffel Tower or the Triumph Arc in a single tap? It will ease your experience and help you gather all the souvenirs!

◆ The Ultimate Matching Puzzle for the next level gaming experience
* Have an enhanced experience in World Connect with mind-blowing music made by a professional. With World Connect, you will visit your dream vacation spot in a second!
* Compete and challenge with your friends and families! Let's find out who collected the most souvenirs!

Take the first tap on a global tour to become a traveling master!

◆ Required permissions
* Device photo, media, and file access: Required to load and show in-game ads.

Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/Soulgitgame/

Twitter
https://twitter.com/soulgitgames

Service Operation Policy: http://soulgit.com/term-of-use/en.html

comments: Best game I have played as an anime geek. Just gonna put it out there, the developers and Facebook page they've created have been very helpful and accommodate most all gamers in case of game gliches. Thanks Manga Clash!  -InoShikaCho - Sunny 64

First issue: I played this game like over a year ago and it worked perfectly fine. Now I try to login on that Account again, and it suddenly doesnt exist anymore. Second issue: everytime I click on accept on the team names menu on the new account, thss game force closes... cant even play this game i loved so much. Samsung A5(2016) hope you can fix this somehow. Edit: Second issue is solved, first one still there. Maybe a help for the first one: There should be a nickname(satar2332,uki23,uki01,wolle12 not sure which one it was) with charakters on the server Aizen. Tia

So...  tried to send them a help request but I couldn't because the "Network Busy" thing. Welp..   EDIT: Okay, so now the game automatically stops. But not frequently, which is good. EDIT: Tried to send another help request bit it didn't go through. I have a strong WiFi connection and can't seem to figure out what's wrong, whether or not it's me. And yes, my airplane mode is off, I'm not using any of my mobile data and yes, I logged out and logged in multiple times but that didn't change anything, I still got the same message "Network Busy".

So I enjoy the game. Paid for not one but two failed recharges, the second purchase was because the first failed. Should've bumped me to vip5 and should've gotten the bonuses for the events for 2000 recharge and the first recharge bonuses. This wasted my real money and I'm very displeased.

Fraud company. Did a recharge and i didnt get what i paid for. Than i report it but the dev dont want to even look into the matter and just stop replying to my message. All this 5 star rating is because of the event where they ask for 5 star rating in exchange of some reward. Its actually a fun game but beware they will steal your money. So recharge at your own risk.

Like the game if it wasn't for the bs network errors and logging me out. That is the most frustrating part of the game is not being able to play it, if you buy a product you expect it to actually work.

description: Real Air Combat War: Airfighters Game  You‚Äôre an air force fighter pilot and participating in air combat war. You‚Äôre going to air battle mission and your duty is to eliminate all the fighter aircraft of the enemy. Perform the aerobatics to dodge the enemy air planes. There are many fighter helicopters and fighter jets ready for air attack against you. This sky fighter game is a modern flight simulator game in all spitfire plane games, air combat war games and air war games. Prove that you‚Äôre the real airborne fighter pilot hero of air strike games and air combat fighter games of all air force games. In Real Air Combat War: Airfighters Game you‚Äôre fully ready to attack on the aircraft carriers, fighter jets, helicopters and all fighter planes of your enemy. Real Air Combat War: Airfighters Game  This air combat air war is a full action packed air battle game. Everyone likes air fighter games and enjoys the fun of air fighter combat using airplane shooting games. This dog fight combat flight simulator is a complete war birds, war fighter and aircraft game. Attack on the enemy‚Äôs warplanes with your fighter jet and air fighter thunder planes finish your air battle mission. Fly your best gunship helicopter for assault air combat war. Huge variety of different air combat fighter jets for brand new battle war missions with different air attack helicopters. Use your fighter aircraft flying skill and become a real air attack hero of this passionate air battle and air combat war game. Real Air Combat War: Airfighters Game  In this arcade flying jet fighter game enjoy realistic and stunning war field and battle field environment with amusing thunder air crafts roaring sound effects. Enjoy the thrilling warplane game missions and use wide range of latest missiles for air attack. In Real Air Combat War: Airfighters Game you are fully loaded with ammunition, armors and different missile systems. This air force game has realistic air fighter games physics for air combat war. Choose different fighter jets before going to air war for air attack on enemy aircraft carrier. This dogfight has real gunship battle with full of supersonic missiles to finish your enemy. comments: I'm not much of a dance gamer but I love simulation games. This one in particular is very innovative with their design and gameplay. I was skeptical of how I was going to like it at first but it proved me wrong and I immediately took to it. The controls are easy to learn and I don't even mind all of the ads. Honestly, a really great game.

The game is great, very time consuming and like the dance options to choose from when making your routine.  The only thing that I hated was the changing of the clothes. The clothes u had on from previous outfits stayed on you. For example....doing a ballet class outfit change, it kept the pants I had on from the hip hop class when I was trying to choose tights. Then I go to the hip hop closet and try to take the pants off but they wouldn't come. I had to uninstall the game bc it got very frustrating and made me not want to play it. Fix that issue and I will reinstall the game.

It's really Fantastic BUT I didn't give 5 stars because 1.spa part is damaged it makes the game freeze 2.I don't like the mascaras they're not natural 3. Why the character is very pathetic,insecure and not confident. She must be a more confident girl when interacting with others. Please consider these problems.. I'm looking forward to playing the next sequel. Thanks a lot

I get through one scene and the app closes itself. Really irritating because I get into the game after three adds finish the scene and wait for the loading screen but the app closes. If it is fixed I would love this game .

It's a really good game, however, it runs really slow, it uses up a lot of memory space and the ads make it run even slower and one of the adverts sends you to the playstore even though you clicked the cross. Good concept but needs more work processor wise.
Something that keeps happening to me. I dance off with another player. And i always win. Then it does firwworks and nothing else! What is wrong with it?!

Have you ever dreamed of just dancing on stage, the spotlight on you, the crowd going wild? This is your moment to compete – you’re a rising star! You've been accepted to step up and dance in the exclusive Fame Dance School - and now your hard work REALLY begins.

This girl is not playing around and will compete with you to make your life a living hell, so watch out! Are you ready for a dance battle? description: Breeding meaning is rising in livestock. Now a day, people love to have pet. This game is about chicken breeding farm factory in which we learn how breeding process taken place in village. It‚Äôs not only a chicken factory game; you all would be able to do poultry farming in your own chicken breeding factory village. It‚Äôs a detailed process for chicken breeding through breeding factory simulator machine. Process:In breeding farm village, collect all hens. Open hen food packet with seizer and feed them. Now try to catch healthier hens from the breeding farm village. Because, healthier hens will be breed more. In your breeding farm simulator, let the hens to laying maximum eggs in chicken factory. After this process we will collect eggs and drop these eggs into bucket. Make sure that crack eggs are out of bucket. Being a poultry farmer of your breeding farm chicken factory, we will pass all eggs through laser machine simulator. Now all eggs are ready for breeding. Put eggs into apparatus machine on the given temperature in our chicken factory. After that we will check that chicks have come out from eggs.  Pick all chicks and drop them into bucket from breeding farm. Let‚Äôs start spa process of poultry farming within our chicken breeding factory simulator. Pick chicks and wash with shower machine simulator. All dust will be removed by spa process in spa department of chicken factory. Now dry them and paint with different colour. Chicks look will be funky in different colour. Chicks are ready to be delivered. We will load all cage of colourful chicks from breeding farm to delivery truck for its onward delivery to other poultry farms so that chicken breeding may exceed more.
descriptionHTML:
Breeding meaning is rising in livestock. Now a day, people love to have pet. This game is about chicken breeding farm factory in which we learn how breeding process taken place in village. It’s not only a chicken factory game; you all would be able to do poultry farming in your own chicken breeding factory village. It’s a detailed process for chicken breeding through breeding factory simulator machine.
Process:
In breeding farm village, collect all hens. Open hen food packet with seizer and feed them. Now try to catch healthier hens from the breeding farm village. Because, healthier hens will be breed more. In your breeding farm simulator, let the hens to laying maximum eggs in chicken factory. After this process we will collect eggs and drop these eggs into bucket.
Make sure that crack eggs are out of bucket. Being a poultry farmer of your breeding farm chicken factory, we will pass all eggs through laser machine simulator. Now all eggs are ready for breeding. Put eggs into apparatus machine on the given temperature in our chicken factory.
After that we will check that chicks have come out from eggs. Pick all chicks and drop them into bucket from breeding farm. Let’s start spa process of poultry farming within our chicken breeding factory simulator. Pick chicks and wash with shower machine simulator. All dust will be removed by spa process in spa department of chicken factory. Now dry them and paint with different colour. Chicks look will be funky in different colour.

comments: It is a good game, has a good design and concept. Only 1 thing for me, if you could atleast make the game playable while offline. Or have an offline mode. People in the PH are not always online. So if you can do that it will be a very good improvement.

I think the game is great, doesnt drain the battery but the learning curve is too high... I don't think casual players or even kids would put a lot of effort playing this fantastic game.  I think there should be an offline mode and a way easier version for the kids that just wants to play for fun. The best part about this game is the PVP. I like competing with other players. A rank system and a customizable character like hairs, eyes colors, taunt, a way to talk to players (like a set of Dialogue to choose from) along with the current types of character would be great and a sense of constant rewards like items to keep the players motivated.

description: From the streets of rough Tondo comes a young man named Joaquin ‚Äúwax‚Äù Rivera: a talented but inexperienced basketball hopeful, taking his first steps towards basketball greatness.He‚Äôll face against a cast of fascinating yet hardcore ballers, all eager to challenge him in his struggle to climb up to the big leagues. Will he make it, or will his passion burn out?SHOOTOUTFeaturing a simple yet challenging touch mechanic, prepare to engage in a battle of skill against other league aspirants in the game‚Äôs Shootout mode! Take the fight to the next level by using an array of incredible skills granted by the basketball stars of Barangay 143. From superfast shots to debilitating threats, each character has their own way of gaining an edge!RANKINGRise up the leaderboards as you improve your skill, gaining various rewards and fame in your quest for courtside glory, from your humble Tondo street corner beginnings, up all the way to the prestigious stadiums!CUSTOMIZATIONAs you play the game, you‚Äôll earn coins that allow you to buy Power-Ups that‚Äôll help you even the playing field. Boost your accuracy, speed up your shots and even deny skills for you and your opponent if you‚Äôre feeling confident. Whatever your playstyle is, the league‚Äôs got you covered! Bored with your current look? Hop in the game‚Äôs shop and sport some new threads! Select from a collection of fancy outfits that showcases your own baller flavor before hitting the courts!
descriptionHTML:
From the streets of rough Tondo comes a young man named Joaquin “wax” Rivera: a talented but inexperienced basketball hopeful, taking his first steps towards basketball greatness.

He’ll face against a cast of fascinating yet hardcore ballers, all eager to challenge him in his struggle to climb up to the big leagues.
Will he make it, or will his passion burn out?

SHOOTOUT
Featuring a simple yet challenging touch mechanic, prepare to engage in a battle of skill against other league aspirants in the game’s Shootout mode!

Take the fight to the next level by using an array of incredible skills granted by the basketball stars of Barangay 143. From superfast shots to debilitating threats, each character has their own way of gaining an edge!

RANKING
Rise up the leaderboards as you improve your skill, gaining various rewards and fame in your quest for courtside glory, from your humble Tondo street corner beginnings, up all the way to the prestigious stadiums!

CUSTOMIZATION
As you play the game, you’ll earn coins that allow you to buy Power-Ups that’ll help you even the playing field. Boost your accuracy, speed up your shots and even deny skills for you and your opponent if you’re feeling confident. Whatever your playstyle is, the league’s got you covered!

Bored with your current look? Hop in the game’s shop and sport some new threads! Select from a collection of fancy outfits that showcases your own baller flavor before hitting the courts!
developerAddress: Estuar Bldg. Timog Avenue, Quezon City, NCR, Philippines
recentChanges: - League duration reduced from 24 hours to 4 hours
- Skill duration is extended and can now only be used once
summary: Follow the story of Wax and help him prove his mettle on the Barangay court!
title: Barangay 143: Street League

comments: The ads in this game made it unplayable. I used to love this game and I downloaded it to try playing again and I would get minute and a half ads after every third attempt at a level. It felt like nearly every time I failed a level it would ask me if the level was too hard and I needed a hint. This game is incredibly obnoxious to play with ads on

Well i would give this five stars but you cant watch an add to get a power up! And you should lower the ad mount of adds i cant go in for 10 seconds without an add popping up!! Overall good great game
Way too many ads after every time I lose or go onto another level an advert pops up. Verry annoying. But the gameplay is decent.

Look, I understand that you have to make money somehow, and ads are how you make money on a free game. But these ads are way too frequent and obnoxious. I listen to podcasts while playing games and every minute or so my sound cuts out completely to prioritize the ad. Earn the ad by giving me a decent amount of playtime before it and stop overriding my audio.

I like the game itself but when you have 3 adds coming up after one game you hardly can enjoy the game. Super annoying, so if you download it for free be prepared to buy it otherwise it will drive you crazy!
The game is good but it contains too many adds.. it sucks.. after every 2 or 3 levels an add pops up, it irritates so much... pls increase the interval of the adds

comments: I have only played the first hour or two.  Controls: This game seems great. The sharp turns allows for skill based movement. It feels sharp and the total opposite of clunky like meny mobile games are. It's really tight controls and brilliant mechanics allow for very nice gameplay  Gameplay: I love it. Its simple and yet so advanced. The heath comeing back from hitting the same color means you need to track how you look while you move down a beautiful level. You don't need to go for score you can play casual. The more advance and tricky things you can do allows for both casual and hardcore gamers to get along with this game  Flaws: I've played and hour or two and I get the feeling it's not gonna change up that much I fear I might get bored however so far not once have I been. I also wish you could upgrade you character as opposed to changing to another as I only like the look of the first character.  Dispite this this game is brilliant so far and I hope it stays brilliant. I rated 5 stars but it's more like a 4.9 due to my personal taste in games
I reinstalled it and it worked, lets hope I dont have to keep doing that
This game is so cool but after finishin playin it keeps gettin stuck

Everytime i open this game it needs internet it eill not open without internet, you need to open with internet after that you can turn off your internet and use it,if you close the game you need an internet connection to work the game

comments: It's an OK game. I love the Just Dance games and how they encourage us to move more, but I feel like there's lots of room for improvement on this app, more devices should be compatible. I'd like to be able to use a second phone as the screen to play on, it would make the game a lot more portable. Maybe if there was a way to use a Kindle Fire as the screen to watch? Overall my biggest complaint is it's too hard to find a device to use as a screen. I don't hate it, but I would like more options to play, none of my devices seem compatible as the screen.

I like it, I use it to exercise and have fun with my sister. Only question I have is: How accurate is the kcal Burned counter? I played for over an hour and I am told I burnt 1,252 KCals. I question the accuracy of this. You update the game often, so can you put in the game somewhere the average calories the song the user is choosing to play burns? That is my biggest concern. Otherwise, no issues. Fun, easy to use. Great way to get exercise in all the while enjoying it with family and friends.

Ok really liked this more when it had a free song selection, even tho at the time I wanted more free songs.. Being able to play a song once you get the free coins 100 per day(extra 100 for watching a video)... The cost of one song on this app... Makes this app a little less enjoyable. I believe free songs need to come back, or maybe more free coins. My children enjoy this but not alot for under fives... Children songs need to cost less coins. Songs prices should definitely not be more than 100 coins.

Game is good as all just dance video games. Daughter enjoyed it until noticed that she had only a few dances then had to wait. There should be at least a shorter time to wait. Or some sort of option to earn more coins. Because 2 videos weren't enough. And one of them didn't work because the connection was lost. Again game was okay as for game play. But not sure its a keeper.

How can I say no to this game? It's my favourite game ever. I even have all the Just Dance games (except the kids ones) on my consoles, which are Wii, Wii U and Nintendo Switch. But anyways yeah, I'd totally recommend it. Don't forget to tell your friends, your pandas, vegetables and fruit Loops about it. Happy Just Dancing! ‚ò∫

It's fun to do and this game is perfect for me because I love to dance. Dancing is my favorite thing to go when I'm bored. I love the songs and dance moves it's awesome to play and do. Thx for making this game cause now I can do more dancing and dance moves. You guys should download this game for you new people cause it's awesome to learn but in a fun way. So if you suck and don't know how to dance then you should download this game it's perfect for you if you want to know how to do simple but hard dancing moves.

comments: Great game. First turn based strategy game that I have enjoyed in a long time. There is no dumb energy bar that you have to wait to refill which is amazing.  Also there are no ads unless you voluntarily watch one to get a bonus to a chest. The only thing I wish was different is that the player could unlock multiple chest at once. It's quite slow to open chests as it is and it would be awesome to be able to unlock more chests at the same time. Overall it's a great game with a bright future. I would definitely recommend getting it.

Just downloaded. Like what I see so far and can play casually. No ads interfering with game play. Hope to see some strategic maps in the future. I'll change my review once I get to know the game better. This is definitely NOT one of those ridiculous grindfest mobile games. There's gaming consoles and PC's for that nonsense.
I just installed your f game and i give you this rewiew. I dont know how much you pay for your adds but your game sucks!!!
Most impressive strategy game on mobile. Reminds me of a scaled down Advance Wars but also unique. No pay to win and levelling is not absolutely necessary to beat higher level opponents. Great game.

The concept is great, and I love the idea you put into it. Id continue playing more if there were a few tweaks done. It took 5 minutes (literally) to match up to someone who didn't fight (not a *bot* we get to fight in the beginning) as well as take a minute each to unlock a 15s chest...  Otherwise its nice!
I do enjoy this game, however there needs to have a few more features, a story mode would do great, as i can see so much potential with the sensos having their own story

comments: Great game! Don't hesitate to download! Install now! I thought it wont be as addictive as the last game I played but I was all wrong. The concept of the game is brillant and the idea of having a princess save her own makes the game much better. It's addictive and the graphics are sooo magnificent. I'm thankful for this gane because it relieved my stress by entertainment.

I was skeptic at first, but when I started playing it, I saw how entertaining it can be. The game is really simple, you don't have to be a brain genius and to top it off, it has the most adorable graphics, with a cute character description. Sometimes I found myself raging while playing because I couldn't get an objective right, but this game is an awesome experience.
I really want to like the game but the ads are really bad!  Game says in app purchases but I don't see where you can buy things in game. Such as the ability to buy something to remove ads.

nice gameplay..graphics is superb when I played it on oppo f1s device, the fireflies really glows,,very nice lighting effect.. but when I play it on asus tablet, the graphics is a bit simpler, the fireflies dont glow much,, i guess my asus tablet cant render high graphics. *I like the previous look of the dragon more than the updated

Once Upon A Tower is alright. I love the combination of colors and cartoon design. And the concept, a princess saving herself (although being endless), is above average.   However, this is where compliments end and criticisms begin. To start, there is no music. To fix it, add some music or short melodies (I'd recommend music which fit themes of medieval or adventurous). The next problem is the control. It's not bad, but I think a directional pad option will allow for better precision (Ex. To whack something while in air).   I also think the concept is reaching below its unlimited potential due to the size of the tower. Because it's so thin, the space for movement is moving one or two spaces before going down. Although it creates good time-based platform action, it doesn't give good exploration action. These result in a somewhat repetitive wait, and wishing the dangers below was visible.   If the tower had various rooms and enemies, I would think more of the game. But as it stands, the two objective compliments I can give are the aesthetics and the (better than normal) idea. All this being said, I think Once Upon A Tower is 3/5 stars.
Good game, when you bored you can play this game. Only problem is; if you succesfully complete stage 1 loading screen come all time. Actually this is not a problem but loading screens are boring.

It is deceptively simple, yet profoundly deep.Play through the extensive stages, sharpening your wits as you have fun.SummaryA brain-training puzzle game that activates your mind as you play.When you've got a spare moment, on your daily commute, or before going to bed, why not experience what it feels like to activate you mind?How to playThere is only one rule:"Connect all the points with just one line."It doesn't matter where you start.There are some fiendishly tricky, complicated puzzles among the large number of stages.When you get stuck, make use of a hint.StagesThere are 10 levels, and a total of 500 stages.At first, it starts off with simple shapes, but each time your level increases, the number of lines increases, and it gets more and more complicated.You might think it's too easy early on.However, clearing the simple stages is also important.The hints to clearing the later, more complicated stages can all be found scattered through the simple stages.Some unique types of line, such as "one way lines" and "overlapping lines", can also be found throughout the stages.These special lines will encourage your imagination.Use this chance to activate your mind as you play, by trying to solve this free-to-play brain-training puzzle game.You're sure to get hooked!!
descriptionHTML:
A brain-training puzzle in which you draw 1 line, that will sharpen your wits.
In this free-to-play puzzle game, you merely have to draw one line. It is deceptively simple, yet profoundly deep.
Play through the extensive stages, sharpening your wits as you have fun.

Summary
A brain-training puzzle game that activates your mind as you play.
When you've got a spare moment, on your daily commute, or before going to bed, why not experience what it feels like to activate you mind?

How to play
There is only one rule:
"Connect all the points with just one line."
It doesn't matter where you start.

There are some fiendishly tricky, complicated puzzles among the large number of stages.
When you get stuck, make use of a hint.

Stages
There are 10 levels, and a total of 500 stages.
At first, it starts off with simple shapes, but each time your level increases, the number of lines increases, and it gets more and more complicated.
You might think it's too easy early on.
However, clearing the simple stages is also important.
The hints to clearing the later, more complicated stages can all be found scattered through the simple stages.

Some unique types of line, such as "one way lines" and "overlapping lines", can also be found throughout the stages.
These special lines will encourage your imagination.

Use this chance to activate your mind as you play, by trying to solve this free-to-play brain-training puzzle game.
You're sure to get hooked!!

descriptionHTML:
Slendrina is back in a new scary game!

Slendrinas baby has grown and has become as evil as her mother. So be extra careful when you are running around in the cellar corridors. You must also be prepared to meet Slendrinas father. If you see him then turn around as soon as possible!

Try to find 8 pieces of a key. Once you find all the pieces, you can open the safe which is in the cellar. Inside the safe there is a secret that you must take with you out of the house.

You also need to find keys to open certain doors
and health injections that give you a little more health when you have been injured.

If you like Slendrina the Cellar, House of Slendrina and Slendrina Asylum, then you will love this new horror game.

Thank you all for your kind ratings you have given me! You are the best!
If you want to send an email to me, please write in English or Swedish.

The game is free but it contains advertising.


Have fun!

comments: Lots of fun,(design + simulation of your tank + real physics).   One thing I need is to control the motor separately.   Example  if my hangar has two 2*5 tread(not linked with one to one) placed with two separate engine if I push forward both the tread are moving forward.I need to control both the tread separately one moving forward and another one backward

Personally I think it's to limiting for a free to play title. I enjoyed the game play it was simple enough. But it forces you to watch adverts or pay money to get fuel. It doesn't regenerate like every other fuel in every other free to play game. I played till the fuel run out, watched several ads, run out of that too and couldn't play no more till the following day when I could watch more adverts. Sorry that's a poor system and one I won't be spending any more time or money on.

Absolutely wonderful. No complaints whatsoever. Not pay to win at all, and the gamplay is seamless, graphics engine is amazing, and attention to detail is on point. Even to the smallest things, like how your soldiers look happy when you win a battle! To be honest, i (previously) never had a game on my phone for much longer than a few weeks, but ive had STR for several months! IF YOU GET THIS GAME: STAY WITH IT! The higher level you become, the slower thing start to progress, but trust me! The game is still great! There really are just so many low level players because people get rid of this game once they dont level up as often. So all things considered,the only negative is the player/level count.

This is a very well made game and has a neat concept to it. The major game breaking issue is the fuel cost and the time it takes to regenerate. You can burn all your fuel within 5 minutes of play, then you can watch 5 ads per day for 5 minutes more of play. You have passive fuel that builds up but it is so slow it will only generate ~20 minutes more a day. So 30minutes a day non consecutive play without dumping cash into the game over and over breaks this otherwise good game for me.

Good game except the the oil usage to gain  ratio is a little steep. Maximum oil is like 1000 and each battle costs 100 with relatives costing 200. And an oil generator that only produces a small amount. Need to have a better way to get that go go juice

description: The One Stop Phonics Game Shop - Secret Game Version!22 Phonics games covering 8 English Phonics Subjects and Topics3 Alphabet / ABC Games‚Äì Helps students learn the difference between upper and lower case letters with a matching and hidden words game. Then play the sound matching / Phonic game to help them learn the sounds, not just the names, of the letters3 CVC / Three letter word Games ‚Äì Moving from ABC to blending sounds to make simple Consonant ‚Äì Vowel ‚Äì Consonant words. Here you can find a picture / Vocab matching phonics game, a sound quiz to recognize the sounds that make up these simple words and a hidden words phonics game to again help with expanding vocabulary. Consonant Blends ‚Äì Learning how to blend consonants in words like sleep and brown is a challenge for ESL and English students. The three games here will help them master this. A Vocabulary matching game, a sounds and phonics game and hidden words game.Wh/Ch/Sh/Th (digraphs) Phonics games - three separate sounds and three games to help learn them. Matching words,  hidden words and phonics sounds games Vowels Word and phonics game - The vowels are the trickiest wounds in English, different spellings for the same phonic sound. There is a matching game, a hidden words game and a sounds game to match the phonics. Rather than do one for each vowel i have mixed them here so would need some introduction first. Magic E - 3 Matching, phonic sounds and hidden words games to help with this tricky English phonics rule. This is the last of the three game subjects and helps students get used to magic and silent E. Syllables - Two syllable games allowing students to move from single syllable words and learn how to blend longer words and get used to looking for syllables rather than whole words. We have inculded a quiz with syllable sounds and a syllable game for students.Lucky Dip - here we have a sentence game of scrambled sentences and a lucky dip quiz that has past tense, adjectives, verbs, nouns and lots lots more.Over 22 Phonic Games all for free in this app including Sound matching, hidden words, scrambled syllables and words, quizzes and picture and word matching.Hidden behind the pictures is a little bonus game for students, parents and teachers to take a break from! The blue bird is the clue! As Education moves on Students and schools are looking for moe interactivity in lessons and these phonics games help to acheive that. Although simple they are targetted for specific lessons, and can be played for a shirt time. They are aimed to enable teachers to just give the game and let students play the phonic game they need, rather than have to teach the students how to use the app. There is also an ad free version of these phonics games with a little additional content in the quizzes and sound games, just in case school prefer to have phonics games with no ads. It will also be availible on the websitewww.makingenglishfun.com if you would like to play in classrooms or on PC. I am a teacher of English and use phonic games when needed in my lessons, i wanted simple ones to save time and when i couldnt fine them i decided to try to make my own, i hope these are useful for your teaching of phonics as well. Please get in touch with suggestions, corrections or ideas!
descriptionHTML:
The One Stop Phonics Game Shop - Secret Game Version!

22 Phonics games covering 8 English Phonics Subjects and Topics

3 Alphabet / ABC Games– Helps students learn the difference between upper and lower case letters with a matching and hidden words game. Then play the sound matching / Phonic game to help them learn the sounds, not just the names, of the letters

3 CVC / Three letter word Games – Moving from ABC to blending sounds to make simple Consonant – Vowel – Consonant words. Here you can find a picture / Vocab matching phonics game, a sound quiz to recognize the sounds that make up these simple words and a hidden words phonics game to again help with expanding vocabulary.

Consonant Blends – Learning how to blend consonants in words like sleep and brown is a challenge for ESL and English students. The three games here will help them master this. A Vocabulary matching game, a sounds and phonics game and hidden words game.

Wh/Ch/Sh/Th (digraphs) Phonics games - three separate sounds and three games to help learn them. Matching words, hidden words and phonics sounds games

Vowels Word and phonics game - The vowels are the trickiest wounds in English, different spellings for the same phonic sound. There is a matching game, a hidden words game and a sounds game to match the phonics. Rather than do one for each vowel i have mixed them here so would need some introduction first.

Magic E - 3 Matching, phonic sounds and hidden words games to help with this tricky English phonics rule. This is the last of the three game subjects and helps students get used to magic and silent E.

Syllables - Two syllable games allowing students to move from single syllable words and learn how to blend longer words and get used to looking for syllables rather than whole words. We have inculded a quiz with syllable sounds and a syllable game for students.

Lucky Dip - here we have a sentence game of scrambled sentences and a lucky dip quiz that has past tense, adjectives, verbs, nouns and lots lots more.

Over 22 Phonic Games all for free in this app including Sound matching, hidden words, scrambled syllables and words, quizzes and picture and word matching.

Hidden behind the pictures is a little bonus game for students, parents and teachers to take a break from! The blue bird is the clue!

As Education moves on Students and schools are looking for moe interactivity in lessons and these phonics games help to acheive that. Although simple they are targetted for specific lessons, and can be played for a shirt time. They are aimed to enable teachers to just give the game and let students play the phonic game they need, rather than have to teach the students how to use the app.

There is also an ad free version of these phonics games with a little additional content in the quizzes and sound games, just in case school prefer to have phonics games with no ads.

It will also be availible on the website

www.makingenglishfun.com if you would like to play in classrooms or on PC.

I am a teacher of English and use phonic games when needed in my lessons, i wanted simple ones to save time and when i couldnt fine them i decided to try to make my own, i hope these are useful for your teaching of phonics as well.

Please get in touch with suggestions, corrections or ideas!

descriptionHTML:
Battle with the ultimate monster fighting force to lead them to victory in Monster Legends! Breed, feed, raise and train Legendary monsters and turn them into beasts!

Collect mighty monsters to uncover unique skills and boost your strategy in action packed battles. Build a world for your monsters to live, fill it with habitats and breed new species! Take your monsters on exciting quests and fighting games full of strategy. Only then will you be able to prove yourself a Monster Master!

If you’re all about multiplayer games, you’ll love Team Wars, where you’ll be able to duel other Monster Masters and win magnificent rewards and War Coins you can use to collect the exclusive monsters in the Team Shop.

Join your friends and connect with a Monster Community of over 60 million players. Start building, collecting and battling today! Monster Legends is a beast of an action game!

MONSTER LEGENDS FEATURES

BREED & COLLECT – UNIQUE MONSTERS AWAIT
- Collect over 400 monsters: New monsters are added to the game every week!
- Breed monsters of different elements and rarities to create cool new species!

BATTLE LEGENDARY MONSTERS
- Collect incredible monsters of all types in limited-time events!
- Fight in special events made of wonders and dangers packed with role playing action and unknown monster adversaries.
- Collect treasures and rewards in your quest to glory.

STRATEGY-BASED RPG FIGHTING GAME
- RPG progression to level up your monsters and power them up for the battles ahead.
- Your monsters will become stronger as you rank them up in the Monster Lab and equip them with runes!
- Set your monster teams strategically, combining the attackers, tanks and effect monsters that work best together
- Battle games will require strategy and tactics if you want to rise to the top of the rankings!

MULTIPLAYER BATTLES!
- Duel other Monster Masters in the PvP Mode, earn trophies and climb up the leaderboards. The higher you are at the end of the season, the better your rewards!
- Fight in the Multiplayer Mode each season for trophies, rewards, and a chance to reach the Legendary Leagues and become the Legendary Leader!
- The monsters in your Defense Team will need to be strong to protect your trophies from being stolen by other Monster Masters.
- Team Wars are the ultimate Multiplayer Games: Join or start a team, build a strategy with other players and obtain exclusive monsters from the Team Shop!
- Team up with your friends, fight and measure your battle strategy and strength against other players.

BUILD A MONSTER PARADISE!
- Build a Monster Paradise and fill it with everything you need: A Breeding Mountain, Habitats, Temples, and more!
- Unlock special spots in the islands, like the Library, the Temples of the Guardians, and the Monster Lab!

Are you brave and skillful enough to fight for your chance to become the #1 Monster Master in the world? Find out with Monster Legends, the action RPG that will put you in charge of a monster empire!

Download today and start training your monsters!

Check Monster Legends out on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MonsterLegends
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Monster_Legends
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/MonsterLegendsGame

Other great titles by Social Point: Dragon City, World Chef and Dragon Land. Check them out!

Monster Legends is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

If you love your monsters, make them smile. Drop us a nice review here!

description: Dead or alive, save or kill. When the doomsday virus is spread to this place, you wish to become a hero to save people, or just is a prey which is swallowed by zombies? Crowds of zombies are coming to you! Lift your gun, open fire to release your fury! Fight for yourself, fight for your families and friends, fight for the humanity!!   Zombie shooter: fury of war is one of FPS zombie shooting game, you need to hunt zombies, keep alive and save the survivals. Kinds of weapons can let you hunt zombies by any way you prefer. Whether you like accurate short-bursts or like the rain of bullets, whether you like a close battle or single shot from long distance, you can feel good shooting pleasure by using different guns in this game. On the critical moment, the freezing grenade, time bomb, you can choose suitable equipment to help you to escape from the dangerous ground. There are some elements in the scene of this game can be interacted by shooting, like you can eliminate groups of zombies by shooting the petrol can, or you can shoot the item box to get random rewards.   The dreadful virus creates different kinds of zombie, there are some zombies like big monster and some others can fast moving on the ground. There are even several zombie captains can be challenged by you. Fire on their weakness, it can help you to beat the strongest zombie captain. beat these zombies, find and hunt the zombie captain, then gain rewards and buy more powerful weapon.Exciting and exquisite game graphics will make you immerse in this zombie world, pull the trigger, shoot , gain the rewards, buy new guns, upgrade equipment, you will step on the way of hero!!!Game features:Free FPS game;Exciting and exquisite game graphics;Different kinds of guns and equipment;Can switch the scope mode as you wish;Exciting zombie boss fight;

descriptionHTML:
Happy Wheels is an obstacle rag-doll extreme sports game, your goals is to reach the finish line, you will encounter various obstacles that can damage your character.

Happy Wheels is a fun and free game is fairly easy to understand and play.
Fun game and funny.

When you get bored with your office work , sitting at the table is just full of paper . Why not have a rolling down the hill under blue sky with csr bike race game on the bicycle wheel?.Drive your bike into a very happy adventure racing under hot sky.
Welcome to Happy Wheels A very happy csr bike race game. You will be a racing biker drive your wheel in the hot racing , your task is tap screen to dash and rolling down the hill, crossing the river, under shining sky and then go finished . Sometime you run like a dumb guy, just find the ways to die. Keep in your mind alway drive ahead, no return, it just dash ahead and ahead , waiting for a little fortune.. If just a small dumb mistake or you’re not a fortune man, many ways to die, your csr bike will be destroyed as a torn piece of paper by the death race.
Tap the forward button to dash, tap turn left or turn right button to rotate your wheel in the air . When encountering obstacles tap stop button to decrease the speed. All you need is timing to tap the buttons and a little fortune.
This game is a rag-doll extreme csr sports game. Experience the real physics based racing game on your phone, Happy Wheels offers an exhilarating mix of amazing tracks, a little of fortune and deadly challenges. Feel the dash speed as you negotiate your way through the deadly survival courses. Perform death defying wild stunts, witness bone cracking impacts and lose a limb or few, and take it to the extreme!
Experience the feeling of rolling down the hill under blue sky with bike race is wonderful, drive rolling ahead the hill, dash crossing the mountain, paper flower is falling in the road. Or just like a dumb guy drive the csr bike to the dumb racing and find the ways not to die. Rolling down a hill under the hot sky,your wheel is hot , your legs so tired, just one way is drive ahead and a little fortune, but there are many hill to rolling, mountain to climb, river to cross and.. many ways to die. So hard but so fun. .
